S04bsu034_u:853: sa tataḥ paścāt tenaiva kuśalamūlena daśānāṃ kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena paripūrṇena kalpaśatasahasreṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:854: so 'prameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā paścād buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvṛto 'bhūt /
S04bsu034_u:855: tatra kumāra yānyaśītiprāṇiśatasahasrāṇi rājñā mahābalena sārdhaṃ bhagavantaṃ ghoṣadattaṃ tathāgatamupasaṃkrāntāni,
S04bsu034_u:858: prītisaumanasyajātāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇyavatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇi paridhāya samyageva śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:859: te 'pi tathā pravrajitā imaṃ samādhimudgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva kuśalamūlena viṃśatikalpakoṭyo na jātu durgativinipātamagaman /
S04bsu034_u:861_0: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantike imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutvodgṛhya paryavāpya dhārayitvā
S04bsu034_u:861_1: vācayitvā bhāvanāyogamanuyuktā vihṛtya tenaiva pūrvakreṇa kuśalamūlena viṃśatīnāṃ
S04bsu034_u:861_2: kalpakoṭīnāmatyayena tataḥ paścāt paripūrṇadaśabhiḥ kalpasahasrairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā
S04bsu034_u:861_3: dṛḍhaśūranāmānastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke utpannā abhuvan /
S04bsu034_u:862: te 'pyaprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān paripācya teṣāṃ cārthaṃ kṛtvā buddhaparinirvṛtā abhūvan /
S04bsu034_u:863: tadanenāpi te kumāra paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyaṃ yathāyaṃ samādhirbahukaro bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarasya sarvajñajñānasyāharaṇāya saṃvartata iti //
S04bsu034_u:864: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tasyāṃ velāyāmetadeva pūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:865: smarāmyahaṃ pūrvamatītamadhvani acintiye kalpi narāṇa uttamaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:867: utpannu lokārthakaro maharṣi nāmena so ucyati ghoṣadattaḥ // SRS_5.12 //
S04bsu034_u:868: aśīti koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa tasya prathamo gaṇo āsi ya śrāvakāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:869: dvitīya cāsīt paripūrṇa saptatistṛtīya co ṣaṣṭyarahantakoṭiyaḥ // SRS_5.13 //
S04bsu034_u:870: sarve ca kṣīṇāsrava niṣkileśāḥ sarve ca ṛddhībalapāramiṃ gatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:871: varṣaṃ sahasrā duvi viśaṃ cāyuḥ kṣetraṃ ca āsīt pariśuddha śobhanam // SRS_5.14 //
S04bsu034_u:872: abhiṣekaprāptā parahita aprameyā vaśitehi bhūmihi ca supratiṣṭhitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:873: āsanna te drumavari bodhi bodhituṃ ye bodhisatvāsta abhūṣi tāyinaḥ // SRS_5.15 //
S04bsu034_u:874: iha jambudvīpasmi abhūṣi rājā dṛḍhabalo nāma mahābalaśca /
S04bsu034_u:875: upārdhu rājyasya tadeku bhuñjate dvitīya cādhasya abhūṣi rājā // SRS_5.16 //
S04bsu034_u:876: mahābalasyo vijitasmi buddho utpanna so devamanuṣyapūjitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:877: labhitva rājā sugatasmi śraddhām upasthihī varṣasahasra pūrṇam // SRS_5.17 //
S04bsu034_u:878: tasyānuśikṣī bahu anyasattvāḥ kurvanti satkāra tathāgatasya /
S04bsu034_u:879: lokāmiṣeṇaiva hi dharmapūjayā saśrāvakasya atulo 'bhū utsadaḥ // SRS_5.18 //
S04bsu034_u:880: abhūṣi cittaṃ puruṣottamasya deśiṣya dharmamimi dharmakāmāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:881: yannūna sarve prajahitva kāmāniha pravrajeyurmama śāsanasmin // SRS_5.19 //
S04bsu034_u:883: sa bhāṣate gātha narāṇamuttamaḥ saṃlekhidharmaṃ sugatāna śikṣām /
S04bsu034_u:884: gṛhavāsadoṣāṃśca anantaduḥkhān pratipatti dharmeṣviha dharmapūjā // SRS_5.20 //
S04bsu034_u:885: śruṇitva gāthāṃ tada rājapārthivo eko vicinteti rahogato nṛpaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:886: na śakya gehasmi sthihitva sarve pratipadyitumuttadharmapūjā // SRS_5.21 //
S04bsu034_u:887: sa rājya tyaktvā yatha kheṭapiṇḍaṃ prāṇisahasrebhiraśītibhiḥ saha /
S04bsu034_u:888: upasaṃkramī tasya jinasya antikaṃ vanditva pādau purataḥ sthito 'bhūt // SRS_5.22 //
S04bsu034_u:889: teṣāṃ jino āśayu jānamāno deśetimaṃ śānta samādhi durdṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:890: te prītiprāmodyasukhena prīṇitāstuṣṭā udagrāstada pravrajiṃsu // SRS_5.23 //
S04bsu034_u:891: te pravrajitvāna imaṃ samādhiṃ dhāritva vācitva paryāpuṇitva /
S04bsu034_u:892: na jātu gacche vinipātadurgatiṃ kalpāna koṭyaḥ paripūrṇa viṃśatim // SRS_5.24 //
S04bsu034_u:893: te tena sarve kuśalena karmaṇā adrākṣu buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:894: sarveṣu co teṣu jinānuśāsane te pravrajitvemu samādhi bhāvayī // SRS_5.25 //
S04bsu034_u:895: te paścime kāli abhūṣi buddhā dṛḍhaśūranāmāna anantavīryāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:896: kṛtvā ca arthaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ te paścikālesmi śikhīva nirvṛtāḥ // SRS_5.26 //
S04bsu034_u:898: mahābalo rājā ya āsi pūrvaṃ sa jñānaśūro abhu buddha loke /
S04bsu034_u:899: tadā bahu prāṇisahasrakoṭiyaḥ sthapetva bodhāya sa paści nirvṛtaḥ // SRS_5.27 //
S04bsu034_u:900: tasmācchruṇitvā imu paścikāle dhāreya sūtramimu buddhavarṇitam /
S04bsu034_u:901: dhāretvimamīdṛśa dharmakoṣaṃ bhaviṣyathā kṣipra narāṇamuttamāḥ // SRS_5.28 //
S04bsu034_u:905_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra
S04bsu034_u:905_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena imaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S04bsu034_u:907: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahākaruṇāsaṃprasthitena cittena tiṣṭhatāṃ vā tathāgatānāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ vā pūjākarmaṇe udyukto bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:909: sa na kaṃciddharmamākāṅkṣaṃstathāgataṃ pūjayati na rūpaṃ na kāmān na bhogān na svargān na parivārān /
S04bsu034_u:913: tasmāttarhi kumāra eṣāṃ sā tathāgatānā pūjā yaduta tathāgatasyādarśanamātmanaścānupalabdhiḥ karmavipākasya cāpratikāṅkṣamāṇatā /
S04bsu034_u:914: anayā kumāra trimaṇḍalapariśuddhayā pūjayā tathāgataṃ pūjayitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate //
S04bsu034_u:915: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ candraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya etadeva samādhiparikarmanirdeśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśamati sma -
S04bsu034_u:916: anantajñānasya daditva gandhān anantagandho bhavatī narāṇām /
S04bsu034_u:917: na kalpakoṭīya vrajanti durgatiṃ durgandhiyaṃ teṣu na jātu bhoti // SRS_6.1 //
S04bsu034_u:918: te kalpakoṭyaścaramāṇu cārikāṃ pūjitva buddhāna sahasrakoṭiyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:919: te jñānagandhena samudgatena bhavanti buddhā varaśīlagandhikāḥ // SRS_6.2 //
S04bsu034_u:920: sacet punarjānati vāsti sattvo yo gandha detī tatha yasya dīyate /
S04bsu034_u:921: etena cittena dadāti gandhameṣāsya kṣāntirmṛdu ānulomikī // SRS_6.3 //
S04bsu034_u:923: tasyaitaṃ kṣāntimadhimātra sevataḥ sacennaraḥ kākaṇicchedyu chidyate /
S04bsu034_u:924: kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikā na tasya cittaṃ bhavati vivartiyam // SRS_6.4 //
S04bsu034_u:925: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ vucyati kṣānti nāma kathaṃ puno vucyati ānulomikī /
S04bsu034_u:926: avivartiko vucyati kena hetunā kathaṃ puno vucyati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.5 //
S04bsu034_u:927: kṣāntyasmi dharme prakṛtau nirātmake nairātmyasaṃjñasya kileśu nāsti /
S04bsu034_u:928: khaṃ yādṛśaṃ jānati sarvadharmāstasmādiha syā kva tu kṣānti nāma // SRS_6.6 //
S04bsu034_u:929: ānulomi sarveṣa jināna śikṣato na cāsti dharmaścarate vicakṣaṇaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:930: na buddhadharmeṣu janeti saṃśayāniyaṃ sa kṣāntirbhavatānulomikī // SRS_6.7 //
S04bsu034_u:931: evaṃ carantasya ya loki mārāste buddharūpeṇa bhaṇeyya vācā /
S04bsu034_u:932: sudurlabhā bodhi bhavāhi śrāvakā na gṛhṇotī vākyu na co vivartate // SRS_6.8 //
S04bsu034_u:933: bodheti sattvān viṣamātu dṛṣṭito na eṣa mārgo amṛtasya prāptaye /
S04bsu034_u:934: kumārga varṇitva pathe sthapeti taṃ kāraṇamucyati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.9 //
S04bsu034_u:936: svapnāntare 'pyasya na jātu bhoti asti naro pudgala jīva sattvaḥ // SRS_6.10 //
S04bsu034_u:938: sace mārakoṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāste buddharūpeṇa upāgamitvā /
S04bsu034_u:939: bhaṇeyurabhyantarakāyu jīvo te maṃ vade nāsti na yūya buddhā // SRS_6.11 //
S04bsu034_u:940: jñānena jānāmyahu skandhaśūnyakaṃ jñātvā ca kleśehi na saṃvasāmi /
S04bsu034_u:941: vyāhāramātreṇa ca vyoharāmi parinirvṛto lokamimaṃ carāmi // SRS_6.12 //
S04bsu034_u:942: yathā hi putra puruṣasya jātu kṛtaṃsi nāmā ayameva nāma /
S04bsu034_u:943: nāmaṃ na tasyo diśatā sulabhyate tathāsya nāmaṃ na kutaścidāgatam // SRS_6.13 //
S04bsu034_u:944: tathaiva nāmaṃ kṛtu bodhisattvo na cāsya nāmaṃ diśatā sulabhyate /
S04bsu034_u:945: paryeṣamāṇo ayu bodhisattvo jānāti yo eṣa sa bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_6.14 //
S04bsu034_u:946: samudramadhye 'pi jvaleta agni rna bodhisattvasya satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:947: yato 'sya bodhāya utpannu cittamatrāntare tasya na jīvadṛṣṭiḥ // SRS_6.15 //
S04bsu034_u:948: na hyatra jāto na mṛto ca kaścidutpanna sattvo manujo naro vā /
S04bsu034_u:949: māyopamā dharma svabhāvaśūnyā na śakyate jānitu tīrthikehi // SRS_6.16 //
S04bsu034_u:950: na cāpi āhāravimūrchitehi lubdhehi gṛddhehi ca pātracīvare /
S04bsu034_u:951: na coddhatehi napi connatehi śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabodhiḥ // SRS_6.17 //
S04bsu034_u:953: na styānamiddhābhihataiḥ kusīdaiḥ stabdhehi mānīhi anātrapehi /
S04bsu034_u:954: yeṣāṃ na buddhasmi prasādu asti na śakyate hī varabodhi jānitum // SRS_6.18 //
S04bsu034_u:955: na bhinnavṛttehi pṛthagjanehi yeṣāṃ na dharmasmi prasādu asti /
S04bsu034_u:956: sabrahmacārīṣu ca nāsti gauravaṃ na śakyate hī varabodhi buddhitum // SRS_6.19 //
S04bsu034_u:957: abhinnavṛttā hirimanta lajjino yeṣāṃ sti buddhe api dharme prema /
S04bsu034_u:958: sabrahmacārīṣu ca tīvragauravaṃ te prāpuṇantī varabodhimuttamām // SRS_6.20 //
S04bsu034_u:959: smṛterupasthāna iha yeṣa gocaraḥ prāmodya prīti śayanamupastṛtam /
S04bsu034_u:960: dhyānāni cāhāru samādhi pāniyaṃ budhyanti te 'pi varabodhimuttamām // SRS_6.21 //
S04bsu034_u:962: bodhyaṅgapuṣpā surabhī manoramā te yujyamānā varabodhi prāpayī // SRS_6.22 //
S04bsu034_u:963: yā bodhisattvāna carī vidūnāmabhūmiranyasya janasya tatra /
S04bsu034_u:964: pratyekabuddhāna ca śrāvakāṇa ca ko vātra vijño na janeya chandam // SRS_6.23 //
S04bsu034_u:965: sacenmamā āyu bhaveta ettakaṃ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālukāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:966: ekasya romasya bhaṇeya varṇaṃ bauddhena jñānena paryantu nāsti // SRS_6.24 //
S04bsu034_u:969: imaṃ samādhiṃ laghu uddiśeyā na durlabhā bheṣyati agrabodhiḥ // SRS_6.25 //
S04bsu034_u:973_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmātarhi kumāra
S04bsu034_u:973_1: bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemaṃ samādhimākāṅkṣatā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena
S04bsu034_u:979: tathāhi kumāra yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvastrikṣāntiviśeṣakuśalo bhavati trikṣāntijñānaviśeṣakuśalaśca bhavati,
S04bsu034_u:980: tadāyaṃ kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,
S04bsu034_u:982: tasmāttarhi kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmenāyaṃ trikṣāntyavatāro dharmaparyāya udgrahītavyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:984: tad bhaviṣyati bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ceti //
S04bsu034_u:985: atha khalu bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ trikṣāntyavatāraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:986: na kenacit sārdhaṃ karoti vigrahaṃ na bhāṣate vācamanarthasaṃhitām /
S04bsu034_u:987: arthe ca dharme ca sadā pratiṣṭhitaḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya sada nirdiśīyati // SRS_7.1 //
S04bsu034_u:988: māyopamān jānati sarvadharmān na cāpi so bhoti nimittagocaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:989: na hīyate jñānavivṛddhabhūmeḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.2 //
S04bsu034_u:991: anantajñānī sugatāna jñāne prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.3 //
S04bsu034_u:992: yaḥ kaści dharmaṃ śṛṇute subhāṣitaṃ buddhāna co bhāṣita tanna kāṅkṣati /
S04bsu034_u:993: adhimucyate sarvajināna dharmatāṃ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.4 //
S04bsu034_u:996: yāsmin punaḥ pudgala sattva pūruṣo neyārthatāṃ jānati sarvadharmān // SRS_7.5 //
S04bsu034_u:997: ye asmi loke pṛthu anyatīrthā na tasya teṣu pratihanyate manaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:998: kāruṇyameteṣu upasthapeti prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.6 //
S04bsu034_u:999: ābhāsamāgacchati tasya dhāraṇī tasmiṃśca ābhāsi na jātu kāṅkṣati /
S04bsu034_u:1000: satyānuparivartini vāca bhāṣate prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.7 //
S04bsu034_u:1002: na co vivarteta sa buddhabodheḥ prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.8 //
S04bsu034_u:1003: ye śilpasthānā pṛthu asti loke sarveṣu so śikṣitu bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1004: na cātmana uttari kiṃci paśyati prathamāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.9 //
S04bsu034_u:1005: akampiyaḥ samathabalena bhoti śelopamo bhoti vipaśyanāya /
S04bsu034_u:1006: na kṣobhituṃ śakyu sa sarvasattvairdvitīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati // SRS_7.10 //
S04bsu034_u:1008: samādhiye pāramitāgato vidu dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.11 //
S04bsu034_u:1010: samāhito labhati abhijña pañca kṣetraśataṃ gacchati dharmadeśakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1011: no cāpi so ṛddhibalāttu hīyate dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.12 //
S04bsu034_u:1012: sa tādṛśaṃ śānta samādhimeṣate samāhitasya na sa asti sattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1013: yastasya cittasya pramāṇu gṛhṇīyā dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.13 //
S04bsu034_u:1014: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste buddhajñānena bhaṇeyu dharmān /
S04bsu034_u:1015: udgṛhṇato sarva yato hi bhāṣiutaṃ dvitīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.14 //
S04bsu034_u:1016: purimottarā dakṣiṇapaścimāsu heṣṭhe tathordhvaṃ vidiśāsu caiva /
S04bsu034_u:1017: sarvatra so paśyati lokanāthān tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya sa nirdiśīyati // SRS_7.15 //
S04bsu034_u:1019: deśeti dharmaṃ bahuprāṇikoṭināṃ tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.16 //
S04bsu034_u:1020: ya jambudvīpa iha buddhakṣetre sarvatra so dṛśyati bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1021: jñātaśca bhotī sasurāsure jage tṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.17 //
S04bsu034_u:1022: buddhāna ācāru tathaiva gocarā īryāpatho yādṛśa nāyakānām /
S04bsu034_u:1023: sarvatra so śikṣitu bhoti paṇḍitastṛtīyāya kṣāntīya ime viśeṣāḥ // SRS_7.18 //
S04bsu034_u:1024: ye lokadhātuṣviha keci sattvāste bodhisattvasya bhaṇeyu varṇam /
S04bsu034_u:1026: sace 'sya tasmin nānunīyate mano na śikṣito ucyati buddhajñāne // SRS_7.19 //

S04bsu034_u:1253: astīti nāstīti vivāda eṣa śuddhī aśuddhīti ayaṃ vivādaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1255: smṛterupasthānakathāṃ kathitvā manyanti bālā vaya kāyasākṣī /

S04bsu034_u:1257: caturṣu dhyāneṣu kathāṃ kathitvā vadanti bālā vayaṃ dhyānagocarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1258: na kleśadhyāyi na ca asti manyanā viditva jñānena madaḥ prahīyate // SRS_9.30 //
S04bsu034_u:1259: caturṣu sattveṣu kathāṃ kathitvā vadanti bālā vaya satyadarśinaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1262: rakṣeta śīlaṃ na ca tena manye śruṇeyya dharmaṃ na ca tena manye /
S04bsu034_u:1263: yanaiva so manyati alpaprajño tanmūlakaṃ duḥkha vivardhate 'sya // SRS_9.32 //
S04bsu034_u:1264: duḥkhasya mūlaṃ madu saṃnidarśitaṃ sarvajñinā lokavināyakena /
S04bsu034_u:1265: madena mattāna duḥkhaṃ pravardhate amanyamānāna dukhaṃ nirudhyate // SRS_9.33 //
S04bsu034_u:1266: kiyadbahūn dharma paryāpuṇeyyā śīlaṃ na rakṣeta śrutena mattaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1268: sacet punaḥ śīlamadena matto na bāhuśrutyasmi karoti yogam /

S04bsu034_u:1270: kiṃcāpi bhāveyya samādhi loke na co vibhāveyya sa ātmasaṃjñām /
S04bsu034_u:1271: punaḥ prakupyanti kileśu tasya yathodrakasyeha samādhibhāvanā // SRS_9.36 //
S04bsu034_u:1272: nairātmyadharmān yadi pratyavekṣate tān pratyavekṣya yadi bhāvayeta /
S04bsu034_u:1273: sa hetu nirvāṇaphalasya prāptaye yo anyaheturna sa bhoti śāntaye // SRS_9.37 //
S04bsu034_u:1275: na tasya pādāḥ prabhavanti gacchituṃ gṛhītva caurehi sa tatra hanyate // SRS_9.38 //
S04bsu034_u:1277: evaṃ naraḥ śīlavihīna mūḍhaḥ palāyitumicchati saṃskṛtātaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1278: sa śīlahīno na prabhoti gacchituṃ jarāya vyādhyā maraṇena hanyate // SRS_9.39 //
S04bsu034_u:1279: yathaiva caurāṇa bahū sahasro nānāmukhehi prakaroti pāpam /
S04bsu034_u:1280: evaṃ kileśā vividhairmukhebhiryathaiva cauro hani śuklapākṣam // SRS_9.40 //
S04bsu034_u:1281: yena sunidhyāptu nirātmaskandhā ākruṣṭhu paribhāṣṭu na śaṅku bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:1282: sa kleśamārasya vaśaṃ na gacchate yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so na kupyate // SRS_9.41 //
S04bsu034_u:1283: bahū jano bhāṣati skandhaśūnyatāṃ na ca prajānāti yathā nirātmakāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1285: yathā naro āturu kāyaduḥkhito bahūhi varṣehi na jātu mucyate /
S04bsu034_u:1286: sa dīrghagailānyadukhena pīḍitaḥ paryeṣate vaidyu cikitsanārthikaḥ // SRS_9.43 //
S04bsu034_u:1287: punaḥ punastena gaveṣatā ca āsādito vaidya vidū vicakṣaṇaḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1291: evamiha śāsani pravrajitvā paryāpuṇitvā bala dhyāna indriyān /

S04bsu034_u:1294: svabhāvaśūnyāḥ sada sarvadharmā vastuṃ vibhāventi jināna putrāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1295: sarveṇa sarvaṃ bhava sarvaśūnyaṃ prādeśikī śūnyatā tīrthikānām // SRS_9.47 //
S04bsu034_u:1296: na vijña bālehi karonti vigrahaṃ satkṛtya bālān parivarjayanti /

S04bsu034_u:1298: na vijña bālāna karoti sevanāṃ viditva bālāna svabhāvasaṃtatim /

S04bsu034_u:1300: na vijña bāleṣviha viśvasanti vijñāya bālāna svabhāvadharmatām /
S04bsu034_u:1301: svabhāvabhinna prakṛtīya bālā na cāsti mitraṃ hi pṛthagjanānām // SRS_9.50 //
S04bsu034_u:1302: sahadharmikeno vacanena uktāḥ krodhaṃ ca doṣaṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca /

S04bsu034_u:1304: bālā hi bālehi samaṃ samenti yathā amedhyena amedhyu sārdham /

S04bsu034_u:1307: buddhāna co vākyamaśraddadhānāste cchedyabhedyasmi caranti bālāḥ // SRS_9.53 //
S04bsu034_u:1308: sudurlabhaṃ labhya manuṣyalābhaṃ na śilpasthāneṣu bhavanti kovidāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1311: te pravrajitvā iha buddhaśāsane adhyuṣitā bhontiha pātracīvare /

S04bsu034_u:1313: te ātmanaḥ śīlamapaśyamānāścittavyavasthāṃ na labhanti bālāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1314: rātriṃdivaṃ bhonti ayuktayogā na te jugupsanti ca pāpakarmataḥ // SRS_9.56 //
S04bsu034_u:1315: kāyena cittena asaṃyatānāṃ na kiṃci vācāya sa jalpitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:1316: sadā gaveṣanti parasya doṣān aparāddhu kiṃ kena vā codayiṣye // SRS_9.57 //
S04bsu034_u:1317: āhāri adhyuṣita bhonti bālā na cāsti mātrajñatu bhojanasmin /
S04bsu034_u:1318: buddhasya puṇyehi labhitva bhojanaṃ tasyaiva bālā akṛtajña bhonti // SRS_9.58 //
S04bsu034_u:1319: te bhojanaṃ svādurasaṃ praṇītaṃ labdhvā ca bhuñjanti ayuktayogāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1321: kiṃ cāpi vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇo bhuñjīta āhāru śuci praṇītam /
S04bsu034_u:1322: na caiva adhyuṣita tatra bhoti agṛghnu so bhuñjati yuktayogī // SRS_9.60 //
S04bsu034_u:1323: kiṃ cāpi vidvān matimān vicakṣaṇo ābhāṣate bālu kuto hi svāgatam /
S04bsu034_u:1325: tatha saṃgṛhītvā priyavadyatāya kāruṇyatāṃ tatra upasthapeti // SRS_9.61 //
S04bsu034_u:1326: yo bhoti bālāna hitānukampī tasyaiva bālā vyasanena tuṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:1327: etena doṣeṇa jahitva bālān mṛgovadeko viharedaraṇye // SRS_9.62 //
S04bsu034_u:1328: ima īdṛśān doṣa viditva paṇḍito na jātu bālehi karoti saṃgatim /
S04bsu034_u:1329: vihīnaprajñānupasevato me svargāttu hāniḥ kuta bodhi lapsye // SRS_9.63 //
S04bsu034_u:1330: maitrīvihārī ca bhavanti paṇḍitāḥ karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī /
S04bsu034_u:1331: upekṣakāḥ sarvabhaveṣu nityaṃ samādhi bhāvetva spṛśanti bodhim // SRS_9.64 //
S04bsu034_u:1332: te bodhi buddhitva śivāmaśokāṃ viditva sattvān janavyādhipīḍitān /

S04bsu034_u:1334: ye tāṃ vijānanti jināna dharmatāmanābhilapyaṃ sugatāna satyam /
S04bsu034_u:1335: te dharma śrutvā ima evarūpāṃ lapsyanti kṣānti ariyāṃ nirāmiṣām // SRS_9.66 //
S04bsu034_u:1339: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra pratipattisāro bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam /

S04bsu034_u:1343_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūta utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ
S04bsu034_u:1343_1: jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu034_u:1343_2: - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvat subhāṣitā ceyaṃ bhagavatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmavavādānuśāsanī

S04bsu034_u:1352: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvastane mama gṛhe bhaktaṃ bhoktuṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena sārdhaṃ bhikḥusaṃghena cānukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu034_u:1353: adhivāsayati sma bhagavāṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasya tūḥṇīṃbhāvena śvastane gṛhe bhaktaṃ bhoktuṃ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvagaṇena bhikḥusaṃghena cānukampāmupādāya /
S04bsu034_u:1354_0: atha khalu candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavatastūḥṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanaṃ viditvā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S04bsu034_u:1354_1: kṛtvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakḥiṇīkṛtya bhagavato
S04bsu034_u:1355: atha khalu candaprabhaḥ kumārabhūto yena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yena ca svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasamakrāmat /

S04bsu034_u:1358_0: śatarasaṃ ca bhojanaṃ saṃpādya tasyā eva rātryā atyayena rājagṛhaṃ mahānagaraṃ susiktaṃ

S04bsu034_u:1362_1: samalaṃkṛtya rājagṛhānmahānagarānniṣkramya yena gṛdhrakūṭaparvato yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat /
S04bsu034_u:1364: ekānte sthitaḥ candraprabhaḥ kumārabhūto bhagavataḥ kālamārocayāmāsa - kālo bhagavan,

S04bsu034_u:1367_1: sārdhaṃ paripūrṇena bhikṣuśatasahasreṇa saṃbahulaiśca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ parivṛtaḥ
S04bsu034_u:1367_3: pūjyamāno 'bhiṣṭūyamāno mahatā buddhānubhāvena mahatā buddhaprātihāryeṇa mahatā buddheryāpathena

S04bsu034_u:1369: atha tāvadeva tasmin mahānagare anekāni āścaryādbhutāni prātihāryāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu034_u:1372: puravara praviśanti nāyakasmin caraṇavaru sthapitaśca indrakīle /
S04bsu034_u:1373: calati vasumatī śirīya tasya pramudita bhonti purottamasmi sattvāḥ // SRS_10.1 //
S04bsu034_u:1374: ye naraḥ kṣudhitāḥ pipāsitā vā na bhavati teṣa jighatsa tasmi kāle /

S04bsu034_u:1376: tatha puna nara ye bhavanti andhāḥ śrotravihīna anātha alpapuṇyāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1383: sanagaranigamā sasāgarāntā pracali vasuṃdhari ṣaḍvikāra sarvā /

S04bsu034_u:1386: chatra dhariya ca lokanāyakasya paramaprīṇita janetva bodhichandam // SRS_10.7 //
S04bsu034_u:1387: śrūyati ca manojña vādyaśabdastūryasahasra aghaṭṭitā raṇanti /

S04bsu034_u:1389: vṛkṣaśatasahasra onamanti sarvi prapuṣpita bhonti tasmi kāle /

S04bsu034_u:1391: ṛṣabhagaṇa tadā nadanti hṛṣṭā hayadviradādhipatī pravṛddhakāyāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1393: mahīpataya ye keci bhūmipālā diśividiśāsu ca āgatā bhavanti /

S04bsu034_u:1395: anye abhiṣṭuvanti lokanātham apari kṣipanti jinasya puṣpavṛṣṭim /

S04bsu034_u:1398: keci vara kṣipanti muktahārān bahuvidha ābharaṇān janetva prītim /

S04bsu034_u:1400: keci vara kṣipanti hemajālaṃ apari punarmukhaphullakaṃ kṣipanti /

S04bsu034_u:1402: kaṭakavara kṣipanti keci tatra apari keyūra kṣipanti ratnacitrān /

S04bsu034_u:1406: paramaduḥkhita ye bhavanti sattvā bahuvidhupadruvu śokaśalya prāptāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1409: sarvi dvijagaṇā nabhe sthihitvā paramamanojñarutāni vyāharanti // SRS_10.18 //
S04bsu034_u:1410: pramudita tada bhonti pakṣisaṃghā madhuramanojñarutaṃ pramuñcamānāḥ /

S04bsu034_u:1413: śruṇiya rañjanīya sattvakoṭyaḥ sarvi ca labhanti kṣāntimānulomām /

S04bsu034_u:1415: na bhavati kileśu tasmi kāle sarvi sagaurava bhonti dharmarāje /

S04bsu034_u:1419: raśmi śatasahasra niścaranti ekaikataḥ sugatasya romakūpāt /

S04bsu034_u:1421: sūryaprabha na bhāntiṃ tasmi kāle na pi maṇi nāgni na sarvadevatānām /

S04bsu034_u:1424: yatra daśabalaḥ sthapeti pādaṃ mārga gataḥ sugato mahāgaṇena // SRS_10.25 //

S04bsu034_u:2950: śītalo niṣparidānaḥ animittaḥ amanyitaḥ aninditaḥ aprapañcitaḥ - alpaśabdo nirdeśena /
S04bsu034_u:2954: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:2956: imaṃ samādhiṃ bhāvitvā kāyaṃ buddhasya jñāsyati // SRS_22.1 //
S04bsu034_u:2959: sameti so 'ntarīkṣeṇa nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate // SRS_22.2 //
S04bsu034_u:2961: yādṛśā lakṣaṇāstasya kāyastasya hi tādṛśaḥ // SRS_22.3 //
S04bsu034_u:2963: balā vimokṣā dhyānāni sarve te 'pyekalakṣaṇāḥ // SRS_22.4 //
S04bsu034_u:2965: na jātu kenacicchakyaṃ paśyituṃ māṃsacakṣuṣā // SRS_22.5 //
S04bsu034_u:2966: bahū evaṃ pravakṣyanti dṛṣṭo me lokanāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2969: yenāsau dṛśyate kāyo lakṣaṇehi vicitritaḥ // SRS_22.7 //
S04bsu034_u:2971: na ca pramāṇaṃ kāyasya labdhaṃ tena acintiyaḥ // SRS_22.8 //
S04bsu034_u:2972: yadi pramāṇaṃ labhyeta kāyo buddhasya ettakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2975: tallakṣaṇaṃ nāmarūpaṃ śuddhaṃ bhoti prabhāsvaram // SRS_22.10 //
S04bsu034_u:2976: na caiṣa kenacijjātu samādhiḥ śāntu bhāvitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2979: samādherasya vaipulyāt kāyo mahyaṃ na dṛśyate // SRS_22.12 //
S04bsu034_u:2980: yasya vo yādṛśaṃ cittaṃ nāmarūpaṃ pi tādṛśam /
S04bsu034_u:2983: visabhāgāya saṃjñāya udāraṃ cittu jāyate // SRS_22.14 //
S04bsu034_u:2984: yasya co mṛdukī saṃjñā nāmarūpasmi vartate /
S04bsu034_u:2985: agṛdhraṃ nāmarūpasmi cittaṃ bhoti prabhāsvaram // SRS_22.15 //
S04bsu034_u:2987: tisro me pāpikāḥ saṃjñā naivotpannāḥ kadācana // SRS_22.16 //
S04bsu034_u:2989: anāsravaṃ ca me cittaṃ kalpakoṭyo hyacintiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:2990: karomi cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ na ca me kāyu dṛśyate // SRS_22.17 //
S04bsu034_u:2991: yathā ca yasya bhāvehi vimuktaṃ bhoti mānasam /
S04bsu034_u:2992: na tasya tehi bhāvehi bhūyo bhoti samāgamaḥ // SRS_22.18 //
S04bsu034_u:2994: svabhāvo jñātu cittasya bhūyo jñānaṃ pravartate // SRS_22.19 //
S04bsu034_u:2996: kurvanti cārthaṃ sattvānāṃ yatra kāyo na labhyate // SRS_22.20 //
S04bsu034_u:2998: kāyo nirabhilāpyo me durvijñeyo nidarśitaḥ // SRS_22.21 //
S04bsu034_u:3000: na jātu rūpakāyeṇa śakyaṃ prajñāpituṃ jino // SRS_22.22 //
S04bsu034_u:3002: na tasya māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhiṣyati // SRS_22.23 //
S04bsu034_u:3003: śrutvā ca dharmaṃ gambhīraṃ yasya trāso na bheṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:3004: na cāsau jīvitārthāya buddhabodhiṃ pratikṣipet // SRS_22.24 //
S04bsu034_u:3006: ālokabhūto lokānāṃ yena yena gamiṣyati // SRS_22.25 //
S04bsu034_u:3007: tatra kumāra tathāgatasya kāyo nimittakarmaṇāpi na sukaraṃ jñātum /
S04bsu034_u:3008: nīlo vā nīlavarṇo vā nīlanidarśano vā nīlanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3009: pīto vā pītavarṇo vā pītanidarśano vā pītanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3010: lohito vā lohitavarṇo vā lohitanidarśano vā lohitanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3011: avadāto vā avadātavarṇo vā avadātanidarśano vā avadātanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3012: mañjiṣṭho vā mañjiṣṭhavarṇo vā mañjiṣṭhanidarśano vā mañjiṣṭhanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3013: sphaṭiko vā sphaṭikavarṇo vā sphaṭikanidarśano vā sphaṭikanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3014: āgneyo vā agnivarṇo vā agninidarśano vā agninirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3015: sarpirmaṇḍopamo vā sarpirvarṇo vā sarpirnidarśano vā sarpirnirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3016: sauvarṇo vā suvarṇavarṇo vā suvarṇanidarśano vā suvarṇanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3017: vaidūryo vā vaidūryavarṇo vā vaidūryanidarśano vā vaidūryanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3018: vidyudvā vā vidyudvarṇo vā vidyunnidarśano vā vidyunnirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3019: brahmo vā brahmavarṇo vā brahmanidarśano vā brahmanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3020: devo vā devavarṇo vā devanidarśano vā devanirbhāso vā /
S04bsu034_u:3021: iti hi kumāra tathāgatasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvanimittairapyacintyaḥ apyacintyanirdeśo rūpakāyapariniṣpattyā /
S04bsu034_u:3022: na sukaraṃ sadevakenāpi lokena kāyasya pramāṇamudgrahītumanyatra sarvākārairacintyaḥ aprameyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3023: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:3027: na teṣāṃ labhyate anto ettakā paramāṇavaḥ // SRS_22.26 //
S04bsu034_u:3036: śakyaṃ jānituṃ buddhasya viśeṣo hīdṛśo mama // SRS_22.30 //
S04bsu034_u:3040: acintiyā hi te kāyā dharmakāyaprabhāvitāḥ // SRS_22.32 //
S04bsu034_u:3042: tathā hi tasya kāyasya pramāṇaṃ nopalabhyate // SRS_22.33 //
S04bsu034_u:3043: aprameyā hi te dharmāḥ kalpakoṭyo niṣevitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3044: teno acintiyaḥ kāyo nirvṛto me prabhāsvaraḥ // SRS_22.34 //
S04bsu034_u:3046: tathā hi kāyo buddhasya apramāṇo hyacintiyaḥ // SRS_22.35 //
S04bsu034_u:3051: apramāṇaṃ yathākāśaṃ mātuṃ śakyaṃ na kenacit /
S04bsu034_u:3053: ye kāyamevaṃ jānanti buddhānāṃ te jinātmajāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3054: te 'pi buddhā bhaviṣyanti lokanāthā acintiyāḥ // SRS_22.39 //
S04bsu034_u:3058: tasmāttarhi kumāra yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ākāṅkṣet kimityahaṃ catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣātkuryāmiti /
S04bsu034_u:3062: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ samādhirudgrahītavyaḥ partavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ pravartayitavyaḥ uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyo bhāvayitavyaḥ,
S04bsu034_u:3066: imāḥ kumāra bodhisattvo dharmapratisaṃvida evaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate - yāvanto vā rūpavyāhārāstāvantastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3069: iti hi kumāra aprameyā acintyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ atulyāmāpyāparimāṇāstathāgatasya rūpavarṇavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3070: iti hi kumāra aparyantā anantā rūpavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3073: iti hi anantā aparyantā acintyā vijñānavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3075: iti hi kumāra aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ saṃskṛte doṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3078: iti hi kumāra yāvanti nirvāṇanāmāni tāvantastathāgatasya varṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3081: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3087: ime kumāra catvārastathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyavyāhārāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3088: catvāra ime kumāra tathāgatasya varṇavyāhārā acintyā acintyanirdeśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3163: iti hi yā kumāra dhāraṇī tajjñānam, sa dharmaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3169: dharmajñāne yā vyavahāradeśanā ācakṣaṇā prajñapanā prakāśanā prasthāpanā vicaraṇā vibhajanā uttānīkaraṇatā asaktavacanatā anelāmūkavacanatā anavalīnavacanatā,
S04bsu034_u:3171: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:3178: anantā nāmavyāhārā ye me pūrvaṃ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3179: śīlanāmā buddhanāmā sattvanāmā ca te samāḥ // SRS_23.4 //
S04bsu034_u:3180: yāttakāḥ saṃskṛte doṣā nirvāṇe tāttakā guṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3181: buddhasya tāttakā varṇā aupamyā me prakāśitāḥ // SRS_23.5 //
S04bsu034_u:3186: tato bhūyo narendrasya svarāṅgavarṇa bhāṣitāḥ // SRS_23.7 //
S04bsu034_u:3188: ekasattvasya te nāmāḥ sarvasattvāna darśitāḥ // SRS_23.8 //
S04bsu034_u:3192: idaṃ sūtraṃ pravartitvā anolīnaḥ prakāśayet // SRS_23.10 //
S04bsu034_u:3196: idaṃ sūtraṃ samudgṛhya bhavanti jñānasaṃpadaḥ // SRS_23.12 //
S04bsu034_u:3197: yathā yathā prakāśenti śraddadhanto imaṃ nayam /
S04bsu034_u:3198: tathāsya vardhate jñānaṃ himavanteva pādapāḥ // SRS_23.13 //
S04bsu034_u:3202: tatra kumāra kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmapratisaṃvidi caran dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī samudāgacchatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
S04bsu034_u:3203: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmeṣu dharmānupaśyī nānyatra rūpeṇa bodhiṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3210: anyad rūpamanyo rūpasvabhāva iti naivaṃ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3212: yaśca rūpasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā /
S04bsu034_u:3214: evaṃ nānyatra vedanāyā nānyatra saṃjñāyā nānyatra saṃskārebhyo nānyatra vijñānena bodhiṃ samanupaśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3223: yaśca vijñānasvabhāvo yaśca tathāgata ityadvayeyaṃ dharmatā /
S04bsu034_u:3225: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:3226: rūpeṇa darśitā bodhī bodhaye rūpa darśitam /
S04bsu034_u:3227: visabhāgena śabdena uttaro dharma deśitaḥ // SRS_24.1 //
S04bsu034_u:3228: śabdena uttaraṃ rūpaṃ gambhīraṃ ca svabhāvataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3229: samaṃ rūpaṃ ca bodhiśca nānātvaṃ nāsya labhyate // SRS_24.2 //
S04bsu034_u:3231: labhyate na ca nirvāṇaṃ sa ca śabdo na labhyate // SRS_24.3 //
S04bsu034_u:3233: evaṃ śūnyeṣu dharmeṣu nirvāṇaṃ saṃprakāśitam // SRS_24.4 //
S04bsu034_u:3234: nirvāṇaṃ nirvṛtī vuttā nirvāṇaṃ ca na labhyate /
S04bsu034_u:3235: apravṛttyaiva dharmāṇāṃ yathā paścāttathā purā // SRS_24.5 //
S04bsu034_u:3237: jñātā naiṣkramyasārehi ye yuktā buddhaśāsane // SRS_24.6 //
S04bsu034_u:3239: paśyitvā kāyu buddhasya vakṣyante dṛṣṭu nāyakaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3240: na cāhaṃ rūpakāyena paśyituṃ śakya kenacit // SRS_24.7 //
S04bsu034_u:3243: evaṃ pañcāna skandhānāṃ jñānaṃ me dharmalakṣaṇam /
S04bsu034_u:3244: jñātvā svabhāvaṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmakāye pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_24.9 //
S04bsu034_u:3246: na ca dharmata buddhānāṃ śakyaṃ vācāya bhāṣitum // SRS_24.10 //
S04bsu034_u:3248: ghoṣamātreṇa vakṣyanti dṛṣṭo me naranāyakaḥ // SRS_24.11 //
S04bsu034_u:3250: na jātu śabdasaṃjñasya bhavate śāstṛdarśanam // SRS_24.12 //
S04bsu034_u:3252: na cānyā śūnyatā uktā anyā rūpasvabhāvatā /
S04bsu034_u:3253: yastu rūpaṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti śunyatām // SRS_24.13 //
S04bsu034_u:3255: na cāsau mārakoṭībhirbhūyaḥ śakya parājitum // SRS_24.14 //
S04bsu034_u:3256: prajānāti hi yo rūpaṃ sa prajānāti śūnyatām /
S04bsu034_u:3257: ya śūnyatāṃ prajānāti sa prajānāti nirvṛtim // SRS_24.15 //
S04bsu034_u:3263: paryupthitāśca vakṣyanti na etad buddhaśāsanam // SRS_24.18 //
S04bsu034_u:3267: evaṃ sā bheṣyate icchā jñātralābhagaveṣaṇe // SRS_24.20 //
S04bsu034_u:3274: gṛhikarma kariṣyanti mārasya viṣaye sthitāḥ // SRS_24.23 //
S04bsu034_u:3276: praviśya ca gṛhāṃsteṣāṃ dūṣayiṣyanti tān kulān // SRS_24.24 //
S04bsu034_u:3278: teṣāṃ ca vipravustānāṃ putradārāṇi dūṣayi // SRS_24.25 //
S04bsu034_u:3282: yathā te pravrajitvā hi paradāreṣu mūrcchitāḥ // SRS_24.27 //
S04bsu034_u:3284: sā śikṣā teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tasmin kāle na bheṣyati // SRS_24.28 //
S04bsu034_u:3286: yā ca sā uttamā pūjā pratipattirna bheṣyati // SRS_24.29 //
S04bsu034_u:3288: anyonyamevaṃ vakṣyanti ete 'pi yādṛśā vayam // SRS_24.30 //
S04bsu034_u:3289: śrutvā śīlasya te varṇaṃ duḥśīlāḥ pāpagocarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3291: na ca hrī bheṣyate teṣāṃ naṣṭaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ dhanam /
S04bsu034_u:3294: dharmaṃ pratikṣipitvā ca vāso 'vīcau bhaviṣyati // SRS_24.33 //
S04bsu034_u:3295: na me śrutaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ vā yeṣāmetādṛśī carī /
S04bsu034_u:3297: yā teṣāṃ kuhanā tatra śāṭhiyaṃ vākkiyaṃ tadā /
S04bsu034_u:3298: jānāmi tadahaṃ sarvaṃ jñānaṃ me 'tra pravartate // SRS_24.35 //
S04bsu034_u:3299: sacet kalpaṃ prabhāṣeyaṃ yatteṣāṃ skhalitaṃ pṛthu /
S04bsu034_u:3302: mā tehi saṃstavaṃ sārdhaṃ kuryāstvaṃ kāli paścime // SRS_24.37 //
S04bsu034_u:3307: kuryā hi gauravaṃ tatra śirasā pādavandanam // SRS_24.39 //
S04bsu034_u:3309: pratighātaṃ na janayet maitracittaḥ sadā bhavet // SRS_24.40 //
S04bsu034_u:3311: yādṛśaṃ kāhitī karma lapsyate tādṛśaṃ phalam // SRS_24.41 //
S04bsu034_u:3315: evaṃ cittaṃ pradadhyāstvaṃ sarve bheṣyanti nāyakāḥ // SRS_24.43 //
S04bsu034_u:3317: prathamaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣeyyā nāhaṃ vaipulyaśikṣitaḥ // SRS_24.44 //
S04bsu034_u:3318: evaṃ tvaṃ vāca bhāṣeyyā āyuṣmān vijña paṇḍitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3319: kathaṃ mahātmanāṃ śakyaṃ purato bhāṣituṃ mayā // SRS_24.45 //
S04bsu034_u:3320: sahasaiṣāṃ na jalpeta tulayitvā ca bhājanam /
S04bsu034_u:3321: yadi bhājanaṃ vijānīyā anadhīṣṭo 'pi deśayet // SRS_24.46 //
S04bsu034_u:3323: saṃlekhaṃ mā prabhāṣestvāṃ varṇaṃ dānasya kīrtayeḥ // SRS_24.47 //
S04bsu034_u:3325: maitraṃ cittaṃ janitvā tvaṃ kuryāḥ saṃlekhikīṃ kathām // SRS_24.48 //
S04bsu034_u:3326: parīttā yadi pāpecchā śīlavanto bahū bhavet /
S04bsu034_u:3327: labdhapakṣastadā bhūtvā varṇaṃ śīlasya kīrtayet // SRS_24.49 //
S04bsu034_u:3328: pūrvaṃ pariṣadaṃ jñātvā yadi śuddhā bhavettadā /
S04bsu034_u:3329: yāvantaḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ sarvāṃstebhyaḥ prakāśayet // SRS_24.50 //
S04bsu034_u:3330: dānaṃ śīlaṃ tathā kṣāntiṃ vīryaṃ dhyānaṃ śrutaṃ tathā /
S04bsu034_u:3333: eteṣāṃ varṇa bhāṣeta evaṃ hi dhārayet sukham // SRS_24.52 //
S04bsu034_u:3335: pratisaṃlānu seveta na dānaparamo bhavet // SRS_24.53 //
S04bsu034_u:3340: kārayet pūja buddhasya samādhiṃ śāntameṣatā // SRS_24.55 //
S04bsu034_u:3352: durlabhā śāsane śraddhā pravrajyā upasaṃpadā // SRS_24.61 //
S04bsu034_u:3353: yena ārāgitaḥ śāstā cittaṃ bodhāya nāmitam /
S04bsu034_u:3354: mā cala tvaṃ pratijñāyāstiṣṭha ca pratipattiṣu // SRS_24.62 //
S04bsu034_u:3355: ya idaṃ dhārayet sūtraṃ kṣayakāle upasthite /
S04bsu034_u:3356: pratibhānaṃ labhet kṣipraṃ pravṛttaṃ yadi dhārayet // SRS_24.63 //
S04bsu034_u:3358: kiṃ vā punaḥ sarvasūtraṃ dhārayed yaḥ śrutārthikaḥ // SRS_24.64 //
S04bsu034_u:3360: yaḥ kuryād gauraveṇāsau kalpasattvopamān sadā // SRS_24.65 //
S04bsu034_u:3361: itaḥ samādhito yaśca gāthāmekāṃ pi dhārayet /
S04bsu034_u:3362: sarvaṃ purimakaṃ puṇyaṃ kalāṃ nopaiti ṣoḍaśīm // SRS_24.66 //
S04bsu034_u:3364: imaṃ samādhiṃ śrutveha yaḥ kāṅkṣāṃ na kariṣyati // SRS_24.67 //
S04bsu034_u:3368: tatra bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhiṃ kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenopāyakuśalena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:3369: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattva upāyakuśalo bhavati?
S04bsu034_u:3370: iha kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike jñātisaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
S04bsu034_u:3371: sarvasattvānāmantike jñāticittamupasthāpya yaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhastat sarvamanumodayitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:3372: trirātryāstridivasasya sarvasattvānāṃ kuśalamūlapuṇyaskandhamanumodya sarvajñatārambaṇena cittotpādena teṣāmeva sarvasattvānāṃ niryātayitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:3373: anena kuśalamūlena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramimaṃ samādhiṃ pratilabhate,
S04bsu034_u:3375: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:3376: sarve mama jñātaya eti sattvāḥ yasteṣamastī pṛthu puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3377: rātrestrirevaṃ divasasya ca trīranumodamī emu janitva cittam // SRS_25.1 //
S04bsu034_u:3378: anumodamī ye suviśuddhaśīlā ye jīvitārthe na karonti pāpam /
S04bsu034_u:3379: adhimuktisaṃpanna ya bodhisattvā anumodamī teṣa ya kiṃci puṇyam // SRS_25.2 //
S04bsu034_u:3380: anumodamī yeṣa prasādu buddhe dharme prasādo 'sti tathaiva saṃghe /
S04bsu034_u:3381: anumodamī ye sugatasya pūjāṃ kurvanti bodhiṃ pratikāṅkṣamāṇāḥ // SRS_25.3 //
S04bsu034_u:3382: anumodamī yeṣa na ātmadṛṣṭirna bhāvadṛṣṭirna ca jīvadṛṣṭiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3384: anumodamī yeṣa na pāpadṛṣṭirye śūnyatāṃ dṛṣṭva janenti tuṣṭim // SRS_25.4 //
S04bsu034_u:3385: anumodamī ye sugatasya śāsane labhanti pravrajyopasaṃpadaṃ ca /
S04bsu034_u:3386: alpeccha saṃtuṣṭa vane vasanti praśāntacāritra ye dhyānagocarāḥ // SRS_25.5 //
S04bsu034_u:3387: anumodamī ekaka ye 'dvitīyā vane vasantī sada khaḍgabhūtāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3388: ājīvaśuddhāḥ sada alpakṛtyā ye jñātrahetorna na karenti kūhanām // SRS_25.6 //
S04bsu034_u:3389: anumodamī yeṣa na saṃstavo 'sti na cāpi īrṣyā na kuleṣu tṛṣṇā /
S04bsu034_u:3390: uttrasti traidhātuki nityakālam anopaliptā vicaranti loke // SRS_25.7 //
S04bsu034_u:3391: anumodamī yeṣa prapañcu nāsti nirviṇṇa sarvāsu bhavopapattiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:3392: avigṛhītā upaśāntacittā na durlabhasteṣa samādhireṣaḥ // SRS_25.8 //
S04bsu034_u:3393: anumodamī ye gaṇadoṣa dṛṣṭvā sarvān vivādān parivarjayitvā /
S04bsu034_u:3394: sevantyaraṇyaṃ vanamūlamāśritā vimuktisārāḥ sugatasya putrāḥ // SRS_25.9 //
S04bsu034_u:3395: anumodamī ye viharantyaraṇye nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsaye /
S04bsu034_u:3396: anumodamī yeṣa pramādu nāsti ye apramattā ima buddhaśāsane // SRS_25.10 //
S04bsu034_u:3397: yāvanta dharmāḥ pṛthu bodhipākṣikāḥ sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3398: ye buddhaputrāḥ sada apramattā na durlabhasteṣa ayaṃ samādhiḥ // SRS_25.11 //
S04bsu034_u:3399: nidhānalābhaḥ sugatāna śāsanaṃ pravrajyalābho dvitīyaṃ nidhānam /
S04bsu034_u:3401: śraddhāya lābhastṛtīyaṃ nidhānamayaṃ samādhiścaturthaṃ nidhānam // SRS_25.12 //
S04bsu034_u:3402: śratvā imaṃ śūnyata buddhagocaraṃ tasyāpratikṣepu nidhānalambhaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3403: anantu pratibhānu nidhānalambho yā dhāraṇī tat paramaṃ nidhānam // SRS_25.13 //
S04bsu034_u:3404: yāvanti dharmāḥ kuśalāḥ prakīrtitāḥ śīlaṃ śrutaṃ tyāgu tathaiva kṣāntiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3405: sarveṣa mūlaṃ hyayamapramādo nidhānalambhaḥ sugatena deśitaḥ // SRS_25.14 //
S04bsu034_u:3406: ye apramattā iha buddhaśāsane samyak ca yeṣāṃ praṇidhānamasti /
S04bsu034_u:3407: na durlabhasteṣa ayaṃ samādhirāsannabhūtā iha buddhaśāsane // SRS_25.15 //
S04bsu034_u:3411: tasmāttarhi kumāra apramatto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra śikṣitavyam,
S04bsu034_u:3412: apramattasya hi kumāra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S04bsu034_u:3414: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ apramatto bhavati?
S04bsu034_u:3415: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:3416: iha kumāra pariśuddhaśīlo bodhisattvaḥ apramatto bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:3417: iha kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pariśuddhaśīlo bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:3418: iha kumāra pariśuddhaśīlo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avirahito bhavati sarvajñatācittena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu /
S04bsu034_u:3420: tān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru /
S04bsu034_u:3422: deśeme kumāra anuśaṃsā dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3434: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3436: nigṛhītaṃ si mātsaryaṃ tyāgacittaṃ ca bṛṃhitam /
S04bsu034_u:3437: ādattasāro bhavati samṛddhe jāyate kule // SRS_26.1 //
S04bsu034_u:3438: jātamātrasya cittaṃ si tyāga eva pravartate /
S04bsu034_u:3439: priyo bhavati sattvānāṃ gṛhapravrajitāna ca // SRS_26.2 //
S04bsu034_u:3442: mṛdū hastau ca pādau ca bhaviṣyanti na durlabhāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3444: mātsaryacittaṃ si na jātu bhoti tyāgeṣu citta ramate 'sya nityam /
S04bsu034_u:3445: priyaśca bhoti bahusattvakoṭināṃ amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.5 //
S04bsu034_u:3447: mahādhane cāpi kule sa jāyate jātasya tyāge ramate mano 'sya /
S04bsu034_u:3448: ādattasāraśca karoti kālamamatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.6 //
S04bsu034_u:3449: viśāradaśco pariṣāṃ vigāhate udāraśabdo 'sya diśāsu yāti /
S04bsu034_u:3450: mṛdu hastapādo 'sya sadaiva jāyate amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.7 //
S04bsu034_u:3451: kalyāṇamitrāsya na bhonti durlabhā buddhāṃśca yo paśyati śrāvakāṃśca /
S04bsu034_u:3452: dṛṣṭvā ca tān pūjayate prasanno amatsarisyā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_26.8 //
S04bsu034_u:3456: daśeme kumāra anuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3468: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ pariśuddhaśīlasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3471: agarhitaḥ paṇḍitānāṃ bhoti nityaṃ viśāradaḥ // SRS_27.1 //
S04bsu034_u:3472: pratijñāto na calati pratipattau ca tiṣṭhati /
S04bsu034_u:3473: arpeti yena nirvāṇaṃ saṃsārātaḥ palāyate // SRS_27.2 //
S04bsu034_u:3476: jñānaṃ ca tasyo paripūrṇu bhoti anuśikṣate cāti tathāgatānām /
S04bsu034_u:3477: na cāsya nindāṃ prakaronti paṇḍitāḥ tathā hi tasyo pariśuddha śīlam // SRS_27.4 //
S04bsu034_u:3478: pratijñāto 'sau na calāti paṇḍitaḥ tathā hi śūraḥ pratipattiye sthitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3479: dṛṣṭvā ca saṃsāramanekadoṣaṃ palāyate nirvṛti yena yāti // SRS_27.5 //
S04bsu034_u:3480: paryutthitaṃ cittu na bhoti tasya tathā hyasau śīlabale pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3481: kṣipraṃ samādhiṃ labhate niraṅgaṇaṃ pariśuddhaśīlasyimi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_27.6 //
S04bsu034_u:3485: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ kṣāntipratiṣṭhitasya maitrīvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3497: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ kṣāntipratiṣṭhitasya maitrīvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3499: agninā dahyate nāsau śastreṇa na ca hanyate /
S04bsu034_u:3500: viṣaṃ na kramate kāye udake mriyate na saḥ // SRS_28.1 //
S04bsu034_u:3502: durgatiḥ pithitā cāsya kṣāntiye anuśaṃsime // SRS_28.2 //
S04bsu034_u:3503: brahmatvaṃ atha śakratvaṃ bhoti cāsya na durlabham /
S04bsu034_u:3504: sukhaṃ viharate nityaṃ priti bhonti acintiyā // SRS_28.3 //
S04bsu034_u:3505: no agniśastreṇa sa jātu hanyate viṣeṇa vā vārigato na mriyate /
S04bsu034_u:3506: rakṣanti devāstatha nāga yakṣā maitrīvihāriṣyimi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.4 //
S04bsu034_u:3507: dvātriṃśa kāye 'sya bhavanti lakṣaṇā no cāsya bhūyo vinipātu bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3508: cyutaśca sa brahmapuropapadyate kṣāntisthitasyo imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.5 //
S04bsu034_u:3509: sukhena rātriṃdiva tasya yānti prītisphuṭaḥ kāyu tadāsya bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3510: sa kṣāntisauratyabale pratiṣṭhitaḥ prasannacittaḥ sada bhoti paṇḍitaḥ // SRS_28.6 //
S04bsu034_u:3511: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā ārabdhavīryasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3522: ibhe kumāra daśānuśaṃsā ārabdhavīryasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3525: durāsadaḥ sadā bhoti paridāho na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:3526: rakṣanti devatāścainaṃ kṣipraṃ buddhān sa paśyati // SRS_28.7 //
S04bsu034_u:3527: śrutaṃ na hīyate tasya aśrataṃ bhoti āmukham /
S04bsu034_u:3528: praṇidhiṃ paripūreti vīryavante ime guṇāḥ // SRS_28.8 //
S04bsu034_u:3530: sukhaṃ cāsyānnapānāni pacyante na viṣīdati // SRS_28.9 //
S04bsu034_u:3532: evaṃ śuklehi dharmehi bodhisattvo vivardhate // SRS_28.10 //
S04bsu034_u:3536: ye bodhisattvā viriyeṇupetāsteṣānuśaṃsā imi saṃprakāśitāḥ // SRS_28.12 //
S04bsu034_u:3537: ārabdhavīryo bhavatī durāsadaḥ parigṛhīto bhavatī jinehi /
S04bsu034_u:3538: devā pi tasya spṛha saṃjanenti nacireṇa so lapsyati buddhabodhim // SRS_28.13 //
S04bsu034_u:3539: śrataṃ ca tasyo na kadāci hīyate anye pṛthū cāpi labhanti dharmāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3540: pratibhānu tasyo adhimātru vardhate ārabdhavīryasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.14 //
S04bsu034_u:3541: samādhigotraṃ ca laghuṃ dhigacchati ābādhu tasyo na kadāci bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3542: yathaiva so bhojanu tatra bhuñjate sukhena tasyo pariṇāmu gacchati // SRS_28.15 //
S04bsu034_u:3544: bodhī pi tasyo nacireṇa bheṣyate tathā hyasau vīryabalairupetaḥ // SRS_28.16 //
S04bsu034_u:3546: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā dhyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3558: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dhyānādhimuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3561: gocare carate yogī varjeti ca agocaram // SRS_28.17 //
S04bsu034_u:3566: yogino hi viśeṣo 'yaṃ yadeko ramate vane /
S04bsu034_u:3567: vimuktiṃ paripāceti taṃ bhoti daśamaṃ padam // SRS_28.20 //
S04bsu034_u:3568: ācāri so tiṣṭhati bodhisattvaḥ sarvānanācāru vivarjayitvā /
S04bsu034_u:3569: agocaraṃ varjiya gocare sthitaḥ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.21 //
S04bsu034_u:3570: paridāhu tasyo na kadāci bhoti āryaṃ spṛśitveha sukhaṃ nirāmiṣam /
S04bsu034_u:3571: kāyena cittena ca bhoti śītalaḥ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.22 //
S04bsu034_u:3572: viharatyaraṇyāyataneṣu gupto vikṣepu tasyo na kadāci bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:3573: prītiṃ ca tasmillaṃbhate nirāmiṣaṃ tathā hi kāyena viviktu bhoti // SRS_28.23 //
S04bsu034_u:3574: alipta kāmehi asaṃkiliṣṭo tathā hi māraviṣayāttu muktaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3575: tathāgatānāṃ viṣaye pratiṣṭhito vimukti tasyo paripāku gacchati // SRS_28.24 //
S04bsu034_u:3576: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ prajñācaritasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3578: yaduta sarvasvaparityāgo bhavati na ca dānena śuddhiṃ manyate /
S04bsu034_u:3589: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ prajñācaritasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3591: sarvasvaṃ tyajate dhīraḥ śuddhiṃ tena na manyate /
S04bsu034_u:3592: akhaṇḍaṃ rakṣate śīlaṃ niśrayo 'sya na vidyate // SRS_28.25 //
S04bsu034_u:3593: kṣāntiṃ bhāveti sa prājñaḥ sattvasaṃjñā vivartitā /
S04bsu034_u:3595: dhyānadhyāyī ca so bhoti apratiṣṭho aniśritaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3596: durdharṣo bhoti mārehi prajñāvanta ime guṇāḥ // SRS_28.27 //
S04bsu034_u:3597: akampiyo ca so bhoti sarvaiḥ parapravādibhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3598: labdhālokaśca saṃsāre prajñāyā īdṛśā guṇāḥ // SRS_28.28 //
S04bsu034_u:3601: sarvasvatyāgena na śuddhi manyate akhaṇḍaśīlo na ca śīlaniśritaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3604: ārabdhavīryo bhavatī vimukto aniśrito dhyāyati apratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3605: durdharṣu māreṇa sa bhoti paṇḍito prajñādhimukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.31 //
S04bsu034_u:3606: akampiyo bhoti parapravādibhiḥ sa labdhagādho bhavatīha saṃskṛte /
S04bsu034_u:3607: adhimātra sattveṣu kṛpāṃ janeti prajñādhimukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.32 //
S04bsu034_u:3608: pratyekabuddheṣu ca śrāvakeṣu co na tasya jātu spṛha teṣu jāyate /
S04bsu034_u:3610: tathā hyasau buddhaguṇāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ prajñādhimukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.33 //
S04bsu034_u:3611: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā bahuśrutasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3623: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā bahuśrutasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3627: saṃkleśaṃ vyavadānaṃ ca ubhau pakṣau sa jānati /
S04bsu034_u:3628: saṃkleśaṃ pariavarjitvā vyodāne mārgi tiṣṭhati // SRS_28.35 //
S04bsu034_u:3630: mārga utpatha varjeti ṛjuke mārgi tiṣṭhati // SRS_28.36 //
S04bsu034_u:3632: ālokabhūtaḥ sattvānāṃ durgatibhyo na bhīyati // SRS_28.37 //
S04bsu034_u:3633: jānāti dharmaṃ pṛthu sāṃkileśikaṃ vyavadānapakṣaṃ pi tathaiva jānati /
S04bsu034_u:3634: sa saṃkileśaṃ parivarjayitvā vyodāni saṃśikṣati dharmi uttame // SRS_28.38 //
S04bsu034_u:3635: kāṅkṣāṃ ca so vivarati sarvaprāṇināṃ dṛṣṭī ca tasyo bhavati sadojjvakā /
S04bsu034_u:3636: sa utpathaṃ mārgu vivarjayitvā saṃtiṣṭhate ṛjuki pathe sadā śive // SRS_28.39 //
S04bsu034_u:3637: amṛtasya dvāre bhavatī sadā sthito āsanna bhotī vipulāya bodhaye /
S04bsu034_u:3638: ālokabhūtaḥ pṛthu sarvaprāṇināṃ na cāpyasau bhāyati durgatibhyaḥ // SRS_28.40 //
S04bsu034_u:3639: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā dharmadānagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3651: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā dharmadānagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya parebhyo dharmadānaṃ dadataḥ //
S04bsu034_u:3654: daśa tasyānuśaṃsā vai lokanāthena bhāṣitāḥ // SRS_28.41 //
S04bsu034_u:3657: buddhakṣetraṃ ca śodheti kṣetraṃ bhoti syanuttaram /
S04bsu034_u:3660: kileśā nigṛhītāsya bodhistasya na durlabhā // SRS_28.44 //
S04bsu034_u:3662: anīrṣukaśca so bhoti saukhyaṃ bhoti syamānuṣam // SRS_28.45 //
S04bsu034_u:3663: vivarjitā akriyā paṇḍitena kriyāya so nitya viduḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3664: mahātmadharmeṣu sadā pratiṣṭhito yo dharmadānaṃ sada deti paṇḍitaḥ // SRS_28.46 //
S04bsu034_u:3665: kṣetraṃ ca tasya sada bhoti śuddhaṃ dharmā vivardhantimi bodhipākṣikāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3666: āsanna bhoti sada bodhimaṇḍe dharmaṃ daditvā imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.47 //
S04bsu034_u:3667: kleśā na santī parityakta vastūn vastuṃ parijñātu svalakṣaṇena /
S04bsu034_u:3668: vimukta sarvehi parigrahehi na tasya saṅgo bhavatī kadācit // SRS_28.48 //
S04bsu034_u:3669: upasthitaṃ cittu vicakṣaṇasya sarve 'pi sattvā sukhino bhavantu /

S04bsu034_u:3671: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ śūnyatāvihāriṇo bodhisatvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3683: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ śūnyatāvihāriṇo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3686: teno viharate yogī yatra jīvo na labhyate // SRS_28.50 //
S04bsu034_u:3687: aniśritaḥ sarvaloke āryaṃ dhyānaṃ na riñcati /
S04bsu034_u:3688: upapattiṃ na prārtheti dṛṣṭvā dharmasvabhāvatām // SRS_28.51 //
S04bsu034_u:3692: vastuṃ nopalabhed yogī vivikto viharī sadā // SRS_28.53 //
S04bsu034_u:3696: dharmaṃ dhāreti satkṛtya buddhadharmānna kāṅkṣati // SRS_28.55 //
S04bsu034_u:3697: ye te vihārāḥ puruṣarṣabhāṇāṃ yasminnabhūmiḥ pṛthutīrthikānām /
S04bsu034_u:3698: viharatyasau tairiha bodhisattvo yasminna sattvo na jīvu na pudgalaḥ // SRS_28.56 //
S04bsu034_u:3699: na niśrayastasya kadāci vidyate aniśritaḥ sevate dhyānasaukhyam /
S04bsu034_u:3700: nirātma niḥsattva viditva dharmānupapattisaṃjñāsya na jātu bhoti // SRS_28.57 //
S04bsu034_u:3701: svabhāvu dharmāṇa prajānataśca śīle 'pi tasyeha na kaści niśrayaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3702: śīlena no manyati jātu śuddhiṃ prasādamāryeṣu karoti nityam // SRS_28.58 //
S04bsu034_u:3703: virodhu tasyo na kadāci bhoti vibhāvitāḥ sarvasvabhāvaśūnyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3704: na cāpi so 'bhyākhyāti nāyakānāṃ saddharma dhāritva tathāgatānām // SRS_28.59 //
S04bsu034_u:3706: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ pratisaṃlayanābhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3718: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ pratisaṃlayanābhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3722: śrutvā ca lokanāthānāṃ caryāṃ buddhāna śraddadhe /
S04bsu034_u:3723: jñāne na kāṅkṣate yogī buddhajñāne acintiye // SRS_28.61 //
S04bsu034_u:3726: pratisaṃvidaḥ sa labhate ya eko ramate sadā /
S04bsu034_u:3728: cittaṃ ca tasyo bhavati anāvilaṃ sarve pramādāḥ parivarjitāsya /
S04bsu034_u:3729: sadāpramatto bhavatī mahātmā samādhiyuktasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.64 //
S04bsu034_u:3730: smaritva buddhān dvipadānamuttamān śraddhāti teṣāṃ cariyāmanuttarām /
S04bsu034_u:3731: na kāṅkṣati jñānu tathāgatānāṃ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.65 //
S04bsu034_u:3732: buddhāna so bhoti sadā kṛtajño na jīvitārthaṃ sa kṣipeta dharmam /
S04bsu034_u:3733: susaṃvṛto viharati nityakālaṃ samādhiyukte imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.66 //
S04bsu034_u:3734: sa dāntabhūmīmanuprāpta bhoti pratisaṃvidaḥ sākṣikaroti kṣipram /
S04bsu034_u:3736: sa buddhabodhiṃ parigṛhṇate laghum ārakṣate śāsanu nāyakasya /
S04bsu034_u:3738: nihanitva so sarvaparapravādinaḥ karoti vaistārika buddhabodhim // SRS_28.68 //
S04bsu034_u:3739: itaścyavitvāna sa bodhisattvaḥ sukhāvatīṃ gacchati lokadhātum /
S04bsu034_u:3740: anutpādadharmeṣu ca kṣānti lapsyate amitāyuṣo dharmavarāgru śrutvā // SRS_28.69 //
S04bsu034_u:3741: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsā araṇyavāsagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3753: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsā araṇyavāsagurukasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3755: alpakṛtyaḥ sadā bhoti gaṇaṃ varjeti dūrataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3760: mokṣānukūlo bhavati vimuktiṃ kṣipra sparśati // SRS_28.72 //
S04bsu034_u:3762: na vivadati kadāci mukta yogī imi guṇa tasya bhavatyaraṇyavāse // SRS_28.73 //
S04bsu034_u:3763: yada bhavati nirviṇṇu saṃskṛte 'sau na bhavati tasya spṛhā kahiṃci loke /
S04bsu034_u:3764: na ca bhavati vivṛddhirāsravāṇāṃ vani vasato 'sya bhavanti ānuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.74 //
S04bsu034_u:3765: adhikaraṇu na jātu cāsya bhoti upaśāntarato vivekacārī /
S04bsu034_u:3766: vacasi manasi kāye saṃvṛtasyo bahu guṇa tasya bhavantyaraṇyavāse // SRS_28.75 //
S04bsu034_u:3768: bhavati ca anukūla tasya mokṣo laghu pratipadyati so vimukti śāntam /
S04bsu034_u:3769: vani vasati vimukti sevato 'syā imi guṇa bhonti araṇyavāsi sarve // SRS_28.76 //
S04bsu034_u:3770: daśeme kumāra ānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍacārikasya dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya /
S04bsu034_u:3782: ime kumāra daśānuśaṃsāḥ piṇḍapātikasya dhūpaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya //
S04bsu034_u:3785: lābhālābhe samacitto yo dhūteṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ // SRS_28.77 //
S04bsu034_u:3786: notsṛjatyāryavaṃśaṃ ca kuhanā lapanā na ca /
S04bsu034_u:3787: utkarṣeti na cātmānaṃ parān paṃsayate na ca // SRS_28.78 //
S04bsu034_u:3789: grāhyaṃ si vacanaṃ bhoti piṇḍapāte guṇā amī // SRS_28.79 //
S04bsu034_u:3790: na mārgate jñātra yaśo na lābhaṃ caturāryavaṃśe bhavati pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3791: akuhako alapaku bhoti paṇḍito dhūtādhimuktasya imīdṛśā guṇāḥ // SRS_28.80 //
S04bsu034_u:3792: nātmānamutkarṣi parānna paṃsī puruṣaṃ pi ukto na kadāci kupyate /
S04bsu034_u:3793: varṇaṃ pi śrutvā janaye na harṣaṃ yaḥ piṇḍapātena bhaveta tuṣṭaḥ // SRS_28.81 //
S04bsu034_u:3794: nirāmiṣaṃ deti ca dharmadānaṃ na lābhasatkāra gaveṣate 'sau /
S04bsu034_u:3795: grāhyā ca tasya bhavate 'sya bhāṣitaṃ dhūtādhimuktasya ime 'nuśaṃsāḥ // SRS_28.82 //
S04bsu034_u:3796: iti hi kumāra evaṃrūpeṣu dhūtaguṇeṣu pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇye viharan buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3801: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
S04bsu034_u:3802: imāḥ kumāra vivekacārī bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pañcābhijñāḥ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3803: sa divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3804: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarasyāṃ diśi aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati /
S04bsu034_u:3806: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3807: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
S04bsu034_u:3808: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu034_u:3809: taṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyena śrotradhātunā sarvaṃ śṛṇoti /
S04bsu034_u:3811: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo dharmanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3812: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
S04bsu034_u:3816: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo jñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3817: kathaṃ ca kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate?
S04bsu034_u:3819: evaṃ hi kumāra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvāntāparāntapratyutpannajñānanidhānaṃ pratilabhate /
S04bsu034_u:3820: saṃkṣiptena kumāra evaṃguṇadharmapratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvabuddhadharmān pratilabhate yatrābhūmiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām,
S04bsu034_u:3823: buddhanidhānaṃ ca dharmanidhānaṃ jñānanidhānaṃ ca pūrvāntanidhānam /
S04bsu034_u:3824: pañca abhijñāḥ sa kṣipraṃ labhati yo vidu raṇṇi sadā sthitu bhoti // SRS_28.83 //
S04bsu034_u:3828_0: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra
S04bsu034_u:3828_1: divyāni cakravartirājyaiśvaryasukhānyapahāya pravrajiṣyāmītyevaṃ tvayā kumāra sadā śikṣitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:3829: pravrajitena kumāra dhūtaguṇasaṃlekhapratiṣṭhitena vivekacāriṇā kṣāntisauratyasaṃpannena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:3830_0: sadā ca ārabdhavīryeṇa te kumāra ādīptaśiraścailopamena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ
S04bsu034_u:3830_1: samādhiḥ śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyaḥ pravartayitavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:3832: khaṅgaviṣāṇabhūtena advitīyena ca te kumāra araṇyaniṣeviṇā sadā bhavitavyam /
S04bsu034_u:3833: ātmaparityāgenāpi te kumāra sarvasattvānāmarthaḥ sadā karaṇīya iti //
S04bsu034_u:3834: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyā velāyāmetamevārthamudbhāvayaṃścandraprabhasya kumārabhūtasyemaṃ pūrvayogakathāparivartaṃ gāthābhigītena vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati sma -
S04bsu034_u:3835: smaramī atīta bahukalpaśatā yada āsi nāyaku anantayaśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3836: naradevanāgagaṇapūjaniyo nāmena tejaguṇi rāja jino // SRS_29.1 //
S04bsu034_u:3838: dhūtavṛtta saṃlekhita śāntamanāḥ iti tasya tena samayena gaṇāḥ // SRS_29.2 //
S04bsu034_u:3840: ratanāna saptana viśiṣṭavarā iha jambudvīpi tada kāli abhūt // SRS_29.3 //
S04bsu034_u:3841: tada kāli te puravarā sakalāḥ pratimaṇḍitā bahu udyānaśataiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3842: udyāna sarvi ghanameghanibhāḥ phalapuṣpamaṇḍita tarunicitāḥ // SRS_29.4 //
S04bsu034_u:3850: iti pakṣi samāgata kāli tadā kalaviṅkamayūravihaṅgarutaiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3851: parapuṣṭa śārika vicitra dvijā bahupakṣighoṣaruta nānavidhāḥ // SRS_29.8 //
S04bsu034_u:3855: pratimaṇḍitāḥ surabhigandhavarāḥ śobhanti puṣkariṇiyo rucirāḥ // SRS_29.10 //
S04bsu034_u:3856: tahi kāli rāja iha jambudhvaje dṛḍhadattu āsi manujādhipatiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3857: putrāṇa tasya abhu pañcaśatāḥ prāsādikāḥ paramadarśanikāḥ // SRS_29.11 //
S04bsu034_u:3858: tahi kāli rājyu śivu kṣema abhūt anupadrutaṃ suramaṇīya śivam /
S04bsu034_u:3859: ayu jambudvīpa kusumairnicito nirviṃśeṣa devabhavanehi samam // SRS_29.12 //
S04bsu034_u:3861: tahi kāli so daśabalo anidho jinu bhāṣate imu samādhivaram /
S04bsu034_u:3862: svapnopamā bhavagatī sakalā na va kaści jāyati na co mriyate // SRS_29.13 //
S04bsu034_u:3863: na sattva labhyati na jīvu naro imi dharma phenakadalīsadṛśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3865: na ca asmi loki mṛtu kaści naro paraloki saṃkramati gacchati vā /
S04bsu034_u:3866: na ca karma naśyati kadāci kṛtaṃ phalameti kṛṣṇa śubha saṃsarato // SRS_29.15 //
S04bsu034_u:3867: na ca śāśvataṃ na ca ucchedu puno na ca karmasaṃcayu na cāpi sthitiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3868: na ca so 'pi kṛtva punaraspṛśatī na ca anyu kṛtva puna vedayate // SRS_29.16 //
S04bsu034_u:3869: na ca saṃkramo na ca punāgamanaṃ na ca sarvamasti na ca nāsti punaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3870: na ca dṛṣṭisthānu gatiśuddhiriho na ca sattvacaru na praśāntagatī // SRS_29.17 //
S04bsu034_u:3871: anupādu śāntu animittapadaṃ sugatāna gocaru jināna guṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3872: bala dhāraṇī daśabalāna balaṃ buddhāniyaṃ vṛṣabhitā paramā // SRS_29.18 //
S04bsu034_u:3875: na ca sa prajānatīha svabhāvu kvaci agatāgatī nipuṇadharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3877: na ca dharmadhātu vrajatīha kvaci evaṃ gatī agati dharmagatī // SRS_29.20 //
S04bsu034_u:3878: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu svabhāvagatī gatiyo svabhāvu na kahiṃci sthitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3879: asthitā aniśritā svabhāvagatī jinagocaro viraju śāntapadam // SRS_29.21 //
S04bsu034_u:3880: śāntapraśānta upaśāntagatī na ca sā gatī kvacana saṃsthihatī /
S04bsu034_u:3881: bhāvu svabhāvu nugatāḥ satataṃ nipuṇaṃ sudurdṛśu padaṃ acalam // SRS_29.22 //
S04bsu034_u:3882: na ca sā calā hi svayameva sthitā asthitā anāgata svabhāvu sthitā /
S04bsu034_u:3883: na ca śakya bhāṣitu svabhāvu sthitī śūnyā ca sā acalu dharmasthitī // SRS_29.23 //
S04bsu034_u:3884: ghoṣaśca ukta na ca ghoṣagatī ghoṣasvabhāvagati dharmagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3885: na ca ghoṣasaṃcayu sthitī ca kvaci evaṃsvabhāvu gati dharmagatī // SRS_29.24 //
S04bsu034_u:3886: gatiśabda uktu na ca sattvagatī dharmasvabhāva nipuṇārthagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3887: ghoṣo 'pi coktu na ca sattvagatī na ca ghoṣu labhyati na sattvagatiḥ // SRS_29.25 //
S04bsu034_u:3888: na ca ananta nānta na ca madhyagatiḥ naivāsti nāsti na ca deśagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3889: jñātā ca yādṛśa svabhāvagatī iya deśanā jinavarāṇa samā // SRS_29.26 //
S04bsu034_u:3890: virajaṃ viśuddhi paramārthapadaṃ śānta praśānta arajaṃ virajam /
S04bsu034_u:3891: na ca kalpa manyana praśāntapadaṃ jinu bhāṣate paramakāruṇiko // SRS_29.27 //
S04bsu034_u:3893: na pi cāsti akṣarapracāra iho vipulā gatirvipulā arthagatī /
S04bsu034_u:3894: buddhehi sevita jinehi stutā avabhāsa dharmanaya sūkṣmagatī // SRS_29.28 //
S04bsu034_u:3895: dharmanidhāna virajaṃ vipulaṃ yatra sthitā apratimā sugatā /
S04bsu034_u:3896: deśenti dharmaratanaṃ virajaṃ paramārthaśūnya nipuṇārthagatī // SRS_29.29 //
S04bsu034_u:3897: aśrauṣi rāja dṛḍhadattu tadā dvipadendra bhāṣati samādhimimam /
S04bsu034_u:3898: so 'śītikoṭinayutehi tadā upasaṃkramī tada jinu kāruṇikam // SRS_29.30 //
S04bsu034_u:3899: balavantu gauravu janetva jine vanditva pādu manujādhipatiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3900: purataḥ sthito daśabalasya tadā kṛtāñjalirdaśanakhaḥ pramuditaḥ // SRS_29.31 //
S04bsu034_u:3901: tasyo viditva pariśuddha carīṃ jina indriyeṣu vaśi pāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3902: adhumuktikovidu naraḥ pravaro imu tasya deśayi samādhivaram // SRS_29.32 //
S04bsu034_u:3903: yada tena rājña paramārtha śruto utpanna prīti ariyā vipulā /
S04bsu034_u:3904: ujjhitva dvīpa sakalāṃścaturo vijahitva kāma abhiniṣkrami so // SRS_29.33 //
S04bsu034_u:3905: yada rāja pravraji jahitva mahīṃ bodhāya arthiku bhaviṣyajinaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3906: sarve manuṣya iha jambudhvaje vijahitva kāmaratī pravrajitā // SRS_29.34 //
S04bsu034_u:3907: vipulo gaṇo daśabalasya tadā bahu bhikṣu bhikṣuṇi prayuktamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3909: akṛṣṭā anupta tada oṣadhayo prādurbhūtā marutparicarāḥ // SRS_29.35 //
S04bsu034_u:3910: kāṣāya tricīvara prādurbhūtā samacchinna susīvita te 'nupamāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3911: amalā virajāśca suvarṇacittā buddhasya guṇocita puṇyabalāḥ // SRS_29.36 //
S04bsu034_u:3912: paśyo kumāra sa hi rājavaro vijahitva sarva mahi pravrajitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3913: bheṣyanti sattva kṣayakāli bahu aparīttabhogā na tyajanti gṛhān // SRS_29.37 //
S04bsu034_u:3914: tāḍana bandhana kudaṇḍa bahu ākrośa tarjanamaniṣṭadukham /
S04bsu034_u:3915: sahiṣyanti rājakula pīḍa bahu suparīttabhoga na ca bhaktu gṛhe // SRS_29.38 //
S04bsu034_u:3916: aparītta āyu na ca asti dhanaṃ sumahān pramādu na ca puṇyabalam /
S04bsu034_u:3917: na ca śilpasthānakuśalā abudhā dāridriyaṃ ca na ca vittu gṛhe // SRS_29.39 //
S04bsu034_u:3919: saṃkliṣṭadharma na ca vṛttu sthitā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyām vayam // SRS_29.40 //
S04bsu034_u:3920: utkocavañcanaka sāhasikā ahamāḍhyu dharma dhanadāsmi jage /
S04bsu034_u:3921: upaghātakāḥ kuhaka naikṛtikā vakṣyanti buddha bhaviṣyāma vayam // SRS_29.41 //
S04bsu034_u:3922: vadhabandhupadravi parasya ratāḥ duḥśīla dāruṇa praduṣṭamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3923: akṛtajña bhedaka vihiṃsasthitā vakṣyanti haṃ te bhaṇa bodhicarim // SRS_29.42 //
S04bsu034_u:3924: yasyaiva tena śruta bodhicarī tasyaiva madhyi pratighaṃ janayī /
S04bsu034_u:3926: śrutvā ca budhaṃ skhalitamekapadaṃ tasyaiva bhāṣati avarṇaśatān // SRS_29.43 //
S04bsu034_u:3927: tadimāṃ kumāra mama śrutva giraṃ mā tehi saṃstavu karohi tadā /
S04bsu034_u:3928: supināntare 'pi aviśvasta siyā yadi icchase spṛśitu bodhicarīm // SRS_29.44 //
S04bsu034_u:3930: bhaṇatī guṇānna ca guṇeṣu sthito na sa budhyate paramabodhigirām // SRS_29.45 //
S04bsu034_u:3931: bhavathā sadāpi akhilā madhurā sada śuddhaśīla suprasannamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3932: pariśuddhaśīla bhavathā satataṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.46 //
S04bsu034_u:3933: na karotha māna na janetha khilaṃ pariśuddhamānasa sadā bhavathā /
S04bsu034_u:3934: mada māna mrakṣa vijahitva tataḥ pratilapsyathā imu samādhivaram // SRS_29.47 //
S04bsu034_u:3936: gaganaṃ ca rātriya nakṣatrasphuṭaṃ tatha kāyu lakṣaṇasphuṭo munino // SRS_29.48 //
S04bsu034_u:3938: pūjāṃ karotha sugatasya sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.49 //
S04bsu034_u:3939: vara gandhamālyakusumā rucirāṃ vāditra tūrya pragṛhīta bahu /
S04bsu034_u:3941: jinastūpi pūja prakarotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.50 //
S04bsu034_u:3945: prāsādikāṃ paramasudarśanīyāṃ nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.52 //
S04bsu034_u:3946: vanaṣaṇḍa sevatha vivikta sadā vijahitva grāmanagareṣu ratim /
S04bsu034_u:3947: advitīya khaṅgasama bhotha sadā nacireṇa lapsyatha samādhivaram // SRS_29.53 //
S04bsu034_u:3948: ahu dharmasvāmi mama yūyu sutā anuśikṣathā mama samādhicarim /
S04bsu034_u:3949: ahu so abhūṣi diśatā suviśruto dṛḍhadattu nāma manujādhipatiḥ // SRS_29.54 //
S04bsu034_u:3950: maya buddha pūjita ananta pure maya śīlu rakṣitu viśuddhamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3951: maya gauravaṃ daśabaleṣu kṛtaṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.55 //
S04bsu034_u:3952: maya putra dāra parityakta pure śirahastapādanayanāgravarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3953: na ca līnacittata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.56 //
S04bsu034_u:3955: dhanadhānya dāsa bahudāsiśatā ratanā prabhūta parityakta mayā /
S04bsu034_u:3956: saṃtarpitā pi bahuyācanakā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.57 //
S04bsu034_u:3957: maya mukti sphāṭika suvarṇa bahu vaidūrya śaṅkha śila tyakta pure /
S04bsu034_u:3958: maṇi śuddharūpiya pravāla ghanā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.58 //
S04bsu034_u:3959: maya tyakta ābharaṇa nānavidhā varamuktahāra tatha sīhanukāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3960: ratanāna jālika viśiṣṭa pṛthu imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.59 //
S04bsu034_u:3961: maya vastrakoṭya paramā sukhumāḥ pariśuddha kāśikadukūlavarāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3962: bahuhemacitra parityakta pare imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.60 //
S04bsu034_u:3963: maya hasti aśva ratha nānavidhāḥ parityakta svapriyasuto mahilāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3964: na ca daurmanasyata kadāci kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.61 //
S04bsu034_u:3965: maya dṛṣṭva pūrvi sudaridra narāḥ paryeṣṭiduḥkhita ca kṛcchragatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3966: maya te dhanena adaridra kṛtāḥ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.62 //
S04bsu034_u:3968: dattā mayā yācanakāna purā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.63 //
S04bsu034_u:3969: udyāna koṭinayutā bahavaḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
S04bsu034_u:3971: harṣetva mānasu janitva kṛpāṃ imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.64 //
S04bsu034_u:3972: grāmātha rāṣṭranagarā nigamāḥ samalaṃkaritva maya datta purā /
S04bsu034_u:3973: datvā ca prītimanubhomi sadā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.65 //
S04bsu034_u:3975: ye datta pūrvi maya yācanake imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.66 //
S04bsu034_u:3976: sudaridra sattva kṛta āḍhya mayā parikṛcchraprāpta paritrāta bahu /
S04bsu034_u:3977: bahuduḥkhapadruta sukhī mi kṛtā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.67 //
S04bsu034_u:3978: yada āsi īścaru mahīya ahaṃ dukhitāṃ ca paśyami bahuṃ janatām /
S04bsu034_u:3979: utsṛṣṭa teṣu maya rājyamabhūt kṛpa saṃjanetva sukhito ca yathā // SRS_29.68 //
S04bsu034_u:3980: ye me kumāra kṛta āścariyā kṛta duṣkarāṇi bahu kalpaśatā /
S04bsu034_u:3981: na ca te maya kṣapaṇa śakya siyā kalpāna koṭinayutā bhaṇataḥ // SRS_29.69 //
S04bsu034_u:3984: kṛta ye mi duṣkara tadāścariyā imu śāntameṣata samādhivaram // SRS_29.70 //
S04bsu034_u:3985: ārocayāmi ca kumāra idaṃ śraddadhanta me avitathaṃ vacanam /
S04bsu034_u:3986: na hi vāca bhāṣati mṛṣāṃ sugataḥ sada satyavādi jinu kāruṇikaḥ // SRS_29.71 //
S04bsu034_u:3988: anye ime 'pi ca prakāra bahū caratā śodhita ya kalpaśatāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3989: kathamahaṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ moceya sattvaniyutāṃ dukhitām // SRS_29.72 //
S04bsu034_u:3990: yasmin kṣaṇe ayu samādhi mayā pratilabdha bhūta mahājñānapathaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:3991: so 'haṃ labhitvimu samādhivaraṃ paśyāmi buddhanayutān subahūn // SRS_29.73 //
S04bsu034_u:3992: ṛddhī ananta pratilabdha mayā sa vikurvamāṇu vraji kṣetraśatān /
S04bsu034_u:3993: gatvā ca pṛcchi ahu kāruṇikān praśnāna koṭiniyutāna bahum // SRS_29.74 //
S04bsu034_u:3994: yaścaiva bhāṣi mama te sugatā praśnāna koṭiniyutāna tadā /
S04bsu034_u:3995: gṛhṇitva sarvamahu dhārayamī na ca bhraśyate ekapadaṃ pi mamā // SRS_29.75 //
S04bsu034_u:3996: taṃ co śruṇitva ahu bhūtanayaṃ praśnāna koṭinayutāna bahum /
S04bsu034_u:3997: deśitva taṃ viraja śāntapadaṃ sthāpemi sattva bahu jñānapathe // SRS_29.76 //
S04bsu034_u:3998: asmin samādhiya sthihitva mayā śikṣitva bhūtanaya kalpaśatān /
S04bsu034_u:3999: bahusattvakoṭinayutāni purā ye sthāpitā viraji mārgavare // SRS_29.77 //
S04bsu034_u:4000: yehī na dṛṣṭa purimā sugatā bhāṣantakā imu nayaṃ virajam /
S04bsu034_u:4001: tehī na śakyamiha śraddadhituṃ paramārthaśūnyata samādhivaram // SRS_29.78 //
S04bsu034_u:4002: ye śrāddha paṇḍita vidhijña narā gambhīrabhūtanayalabdhanayāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4004: te nā trasanti na ca saṃtrasiṣū śrutvā ca bhonti sada āttamanāḥ // SRS_29.79 //
S04bsu034_u:4005: te te dharenti varabodhi samā te te hi putra anujāta mamā /
S04bsu034_u:4006: te te hyudumbarakusumasamāsteṣārtha haṃ caritu kalpaśatān // SRS_29.80 //
S04bsu034_u:4007: na pi tasya asti vinipātabhayaṃ aṣṭākṣaṇā vigata tasya sadā /
S04bsu034_u:4008: drakṣyanti buddhanayutān subahūn imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.81 //
S04bsu034_u:4009: yatha maitrako jinu anantayaśāḥ sattvāna bheṣyi bahu arthakaraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4010: tatha vyākaromyahamanantamatiṃ hastasmi yasya susamādhivaram // SRS_29.82 //
S04bsu034_u:4011: smṛtimān sa bhoti matimān jñānodgataḥ śrutidharo bhavati /
S04bsu034_u:4012: pratibhānu tasya bhavati vipulaṃ imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.83 //
S04bsu034_u:4013: devānāṃ ca sa bhavati pūjaniyo marutāṃ ca sada namasyanīyaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4014: abhirakṣitaḥ satata devagaṇaiḥ imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayati // SRS_29.84 //
S04bsu034_u:4015: na ca so 'gnimadhye mriyate na jale na ca tasya śastra kramate na viṣam /
S04bsu034_u:4016: na ca vairiṇāṃ gamaniyo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.85 //
S04bsu034_u:4017: vanakandare vasatu tasya sadā marutā karonti vara pāricarim /
S04bsu034_u:4018: upasthāyakāśca bahu yakṣaśatā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.86 //
S04bsu034_u:4020: jñānena sāgarasamo bhavatī na sajjate guṇa bhaṇantu muneḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4021: bhūtāṃśca buddhaguṇa kīrtayate imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.87 //
S04bsu034_u:4022: nānto na cāsya paryantu śrute na pramāṇu labhyati yathā gagane /
S04bsu034_u:4023: jñānolkadhāri timiraṃ harati imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.88 //
S04bsu034_u:4024: snigdhaṃ suyukta sada muñca girāṃ parṣatsu bhāṣati supremaṇiyām /
S04bsu034_u:4025: siṃho yathā sa vinadaṃ bhaṇatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.89 //
S04bsu034_u:4026: vaidyo bhiṣaku samu so bhavatī gati lenu trāṇa śaraṇaṃ bahūnām /
S04bsu034_u:4027: ālokabhūtu jagi so bhavati imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.90 //
S04bsu034_u:4028: na ca tasya maithuni mano ramate śamathe rataḥ spṛśati dhyānasukham /
S04bsu034_u:4029: śāntāṃ sa bhāṣati praśānta giram imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.91 //
S04bsu034_u:4030: na ca tasya mānasu nimittarataṃ sarve vibhāvita nimitta pṛthu /
S04bsu034_u:4031: satataṃ samāhitu vidū bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.92 //
S04bsu034_u:4032: cakṣuśca so labhati aprākṛtakaṃ yeno sa paśyati anantajinān /
S04bsu034_u:4033: so 'nantacakṣurbhavati vṛṣabho imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.93 //
S04bsu034_u:4035: saṃgītiyuktasvaru mañjugiro imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.94 //
S04bsu034_u:4038: pañcasvarāṅgaśatayuktasvaro imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.95 //
S04bsu034_u:4040: acintiyā sa gira niścaratī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.96 //
S04bsu034_u:4041: na ca bhojane bhavati gṛdhnumanā na pātracīvararato bhavatī /
S04bsu034_u:4042: alpecchu saṃtuṣṭa susaṃlikhito imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.97 //
S04bsu034_u:4043: na ca ātma utkarṣaku so bhavatī na parasya bhāṣati avarṇu kvacit /
S04bsu034_u:4044: dhyāne rataḥ sukhumacittu sadā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.98 //
S04bsu034_u:4045: ātmānuprekṣī satataṃ bhavatī na parasya skhalitemeṣati ca /
S04bsu034_u:4046: aviruddhu sarvi jagi so bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.99 //
S04bsu034_u:4047: akiliṣṭacittu pariśuddhacarī aśaṭho avañcaku sadā bhavatī /
S04bsu034_u:4048: sadamārdavaḥ sada vimokṣarato imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.100 //
S04bsu034_u:4049: tyāgādhimukta satataṃ bhavatī mātsaryacittu na ca tasya ratam /
S04bsu034_u:4050: śīlenupetu satataṃ bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.101 //
S04bsu034_u:4053: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.102 //
S04bsu034_u:4054: prāsādikaśca sada so bhavatī abhilakṣito bahujanasya priyo /
S04bsu034_u:4055: prekṣanta tṛpti na labhanti narā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.103 //
S04bsu034_u:4056: devāsya nāga tatha yakṣagaṇāstuṣṭā udagrāḥ sada āttamanāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4057: bhāṣanti varṇa praviśitva kulānimu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.104 //
S04bsu034_u:4058: brahmā ca śakra vaśavarti vahu upasthānu tasya prakaronti sadā /
S04bsu034_u:4059: na ca tasya unnata mano bhavatī /
S04bsu034_u:4060: imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.105 //
S04bsu034_u:4061: na ca tasya durgatibhayaṃ bhavatī na pi cākṣaṇā na vinipātabhayam /
S04bsu034_u:4062: parimuktu sarvavinipātabhayādimu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.106 //
S04bsu034_u:4063: na ca tasya kāṅkṣa vimatirbhavatī vara buddhadharma śruṇiyā nipuṇān /
S04bsu034_u:4064: gambhīrajñānānugato bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.107 //
S04bsu034_u:4065: yaṃ yaṃ pi dharmaṃ śruṇatī sukhumaṃ sarvatra bhoti vaśi pāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4066: balavantu hetunipuṇo bhavatī imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.108 //
S04bsu034_u:4067: evaṃ prabhāṣita jinena girā ahu tena bhomi paricīrṇa sadā /
S04bsu034_u:4068: labhate ca dhāraṇi viśiṣṭa varāmimu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.109 //
S04bsu034_u:4069: kālakriyāṃ ca sa karoti yadā amitābhu tasya purataḥ sthihatī /
S04bsu034_u:4071: bhikṣugaṇena saha kāruṇiko imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.110 //
S04bsu034_u:4072: lābhī ca dhāraṇiya so bhavatī dharmanidhāna vaśipāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4073: pratibhānavānanācchedyagiro ya imaṃ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.111 //
S04bsu034_u:4074: yenaiva so vrajati dharmadharo ālokabhūta bhavatī jagataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4075: sipraśāntacara suviśuddhamanā imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.112 //
S04bsu034_u:4076: vara dharmakośa vividhaṃ nipuṇaṃ so dharmakāya vaśi pāragataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4077: so saṃśayaṃ chinatti sarvajage imu yaḥ samādhi naru dhārayatī // SRS_29.113 //
S04bsu034_u:4078: sarve 'pi sattva siya kāruṇikā bhagavān bhavāntakaraṇe sugataḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4079: tān satkareyyā bahu kalpaśatān yatha gaṅgavāluka tathottari vā // SRS_29.114 //
S04bsu034_u:4080: yaścaiva paści kṣayakāli imaṃ śrutvā samādhimiha kaści naraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4081: anumodamīti bhaṇataikagiraṃ kala puṇyaskandha na sa pūrva bhavet // SRS_29.115 //
S04bsu034_u:4082: yasyo kumāra iya śāntagatī paramārthaśūnyata samādhivaro /
S04bsu034_u:4083: prāvartu bhoti tatha pustagataḥ so dharmabhāṇaku sthitaḥ sumatiḥ // SRS_29.116 //
S04bsu034_u:4087_0: atha khalu bhagavān punareva candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi
S04bsu034_u:4087_1: kumāra ya ākāṅkṣed bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - kimityahaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ rutamadhigaccheyamindriyāṇāṃ
S04bsu034_u:4088_0: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ
S04bsu034_u:4088_1: śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavyaḥ araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo
S04bsu034_u:4089: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:4090: aparimita atīta nāyakāstena dṛṣṭāḥ puratu katha prayuktā pṛcchitā lokanāthāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4091: pravara kuśalamūle tiṣṭhato bodhisattvo imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ // SRS_30.1 //
S04bsu034_u:4095: imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ // SRS_30.2 //
S04bsu034_u:4096: varṇu śruṇiya udāraṃ harṣu tasyo na bhoti
S04bsu034_u:4097: na pi ca punaravarṇe maṅkubhāvaṃ nigacchet /
S04bsu034_u:4099: imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ // SRS_30.3 //
S04bsu034_u:4100: akhilamadhuravāṇī ślakṣṇavācā suyuktā apagatabhrukuṭiśco pūrvaālāpi bhoti /
S04bsu034_u:4101: satatasmitamukhaśco śikṣito nāyakānām imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan mokṣakāmaḥ // SRS_30.4 //
S04bsu034_u:4102: bhavati sa sukhavāsaḥ sūrataḥ snigdhacitto bhavati sada sudānto dāntabhūmisthitaśca /
S04bsu034_u:4103: sumadhura priyavāṇī snigdhasatyābhidhāyī imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ // SRS_30.5 //
S04bsu034_u:4104: na ca sa katha karotī vaigrahīṃ no vivādān apagatakhila doṣā varjitāstena śeṣāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4106: pramuditu sada bhotī sūrato mārdavaśca imu viraja samādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ // SRS_30.6 //
S04bsu034_u:4107: bhavati ca sada vidvāṃstyāgi nityābhiyuktaḥ sudukhita jana dṛṣṭvā teṣamannaṃ dadāti /
S04bsu034_u:4108: priyataru parityaktuṃ bhoti nityaṃ sudātā imu virajasamādhiṃ dhārayan bodhikāmaḥ // SRS_30.7 //
S04bsu034_u:4109: devaśatasahasrāṇa spṛhāṃ ye saṃjanentī nāga asura yakṣā nityupasthāyakāsya /
S04bsu034_u:4110: vani pavani vasante rakṣa tasyā karontī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayati // SRS_30.8 //
S04bsu034_u:4112: pañcaśatasvarāṅgo harṣaṇīyasvaraśco bhavati naditaśabdo ghuṣṭaśabdaḥ suśabdaḥ // SRS_30.9 //
S04bsu034_u:4113: yāvatatu pṛthu kṣatrāṇa naraḥ kaścideva sūkṣma raja kareyyā śakya te lakṣaṇāya /
S04bsu034_u:4114: tatu bahutaru tasyo ye svarā niścarantī imu viraja samādhiṃ yo naro dhārayāti // SRS_30.10 //
S04bsu034_u:4118: tatra bhagavān punarapi candraprabhaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma - tasmāttarhi kumāra ya ākāṅkṣed bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kimityahaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaṃ kathaṃ jānīyāmiti,
S04bsu034_u:4119_0: tena kumāra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ sarvadharmasvabhāvasamatāvipañcitaḥ samādhiḥ
S04bsu034_u:4119_1: śrotavya udgrahītavyaḥ paryavāptavyo dhārayitavyo vācayitavya uddeṣṭavyaḥ svādhyātavyaḥ
S04bsu034_u:4119_2: araṇābhāvanayā bhāvayitavyo bahulīkartavyaḥ parebhyaśca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ //
S04bsu034_u:4120: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu034_u:4121: tasyo rāgu na jātu kupyate na ca doṣo tasyo moha na jātu kupyate vṛṣabhisya /
S04bsu034_u:4122: teno sarvi kileśa cchoritānavaśeṣā yo 'sau dharmasvabhāvu jānatī supraśāntam // SRS_31.1 //
S04bsu034_u:4123: so 'sau śikṣa na jātu oṣirī sugatānāṃ so 'sau śūru na jātu istriyāṇāṃ vaśameti /
