S04bsu034_u:4378: evaṃ ca deśitā dharmā na cātra kiṃci deśitam // SRS_32.89 //
S04bsu034_u:4379: na ca jñānena jānāti na cājñānena sīdati /
S04bsu034_u:4384: anudgrahaśca sā saṃjñā viviktārthena deśitā // SRS_32.92 //
S04bsu034_u:4385: yacco viviktaṃ sā saṃjñā yā viviktā sa deśanā /
S04bsu034_u:4386: saṃjñāsvabhāvo jñātaśca evaṃ saṃjñā na bheṣyati // SRS_32.93 //
S04bsu034_u:4387: prahāsyāma imāṃ saṃjñāṃ yasya saṃjñā pravartate /
S04bsu034_u:4388: saṃjñā prapañce carati na sa saṃjñātu mucyate // SRS_32.94 //
S04bsu034_u:4389: kasyeyaṃ saṃjñā utpannā kena saṃjñā utpāditā /
S04bsu034_u:4390: kena sā sparśitā saṃjñā kena saṃjñā nirodhitā // SRS_32.95 //
S04bsu034_u:4391: dharmo na labdho buddhena yasya saṃjñā utpadyate /
S04bsu034_u:4392: iha cintetha taṃ arthaṃ tataḥ saṃjñā na bheṣyati // SRS_32.96 //
S04bsu034_u:4393: kadā saṃjñā anutpannā kasya saṃjñā virudhyate /
S04bsu034_u:4394: vimokṣa ciatacārasya kathaṃ tatra utpadyate // SRS_32.97 //
S04bsu034_u:4395: yadā vimokṣaṃ spṛśati sarva cintā acintiyā /
S04bsu034_u:4396: acintiyā yadā cintā tadā bhoti acintiyaḥ // SRS_32.98 //
S04bsu034_u:4402: yathā sattvāstathā cintā yathā cintā tathā jināḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4403: acintiyena buddhena iyaṃ cintā prakāśitā // SRS_32.101 //
S04bsu034_u:4404: yo raho eku cinteti kadā cintā na bheṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:4405: na cintāṃ cintayantasya sarvacintā vigacchati // SRS_32.102 //
S04bsu034_u:4406: cyute mṛte kālagate yasya cintā pravartate /
S04bsu034_u:4413: na ca cintākṣayo jātaścintayitvā ayoniśaḥ // SRS_32.106 //
S04bsu034_u:4414: yo 'sau cintayate nāma kṣaye jñānaṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:4415: na kṣayo bhūmijñānasya kṣayasyo eṣa dharmatā // SRS_32.107 //
S04bsu034_u:4417: nirviśeṣāśca te dharmā yathā jñānaṃ tathā kṣayaḥ // SRS_32.108 //
S04bsu034_u:4419: kalpakoṭiṃ pi bhāṣitvā animittena deśitāḥ // SRS_32.109 //
S04bsu034_u:4421: na cānyo darśito bhāvo nābhāvo 'nyo nidarśitaḥ // SRS_32.110 //
S04bsu034_u:4423: na cāsau sarvabuddhehi abhāvaḥ śakyu paśyitum // SRS_32.111 //
S04bsu034_u:4425: evaṃ bhāvān vijānitvā abhāvo bhoti darśitaḥ // SRS_32.112 //
S04bsu034_u:4427: sparśanāttu abhāvasya nirvṛti eṣa deśitā // SRS_32.113 //
S04bsu034_u:4428: ahaṃ buddho bhavelloke yasyaiṣā ho matirbhavet /
S04bsu034_u:4429: na jātu bhavatṛṣṇārto bodhiṃ budhyeta paṇḍitaḥ // SRS_32.114 //
S04bsu034_u:4430: na kaṃci dharmaṃ prārtheti bodhisattvaḥ samāhitaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4431: niṣkiṃcanā nirābhogā eṣā bodhīti ucyate // SRS_32.115 //
S04bsu034_u:4433: bahū evaṃ pravakṣyanti vayaṃ bodhāya prasthitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4434: imāṃ gatimajānanto dūre te buddhabodhaye // SRS_32.116 //
S04bsu034_u:4435: śabdena deśitā dharmāḥ sarve saṃskāra śūnyakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4436: yaśva svabhāvaḥ śabdasya gambhīraḥ sūkṣma durdṛśaḥ // SRS_32.117 //
S04bsu034_u:4444: vipāka eṣa śūrāṇāṃ nityakālaṃ samāhitaḥ // SRS_32.121 //
S04bsu034_u:4446: paśyanti lokapradyotān yathā gaṅgāya vālikā // SRS_32.122 //
S04bsu034_u:4448: cittasya vaśitāṃ prāptāḥ kāyasteṣāṃ prabhāsvaraḥ // SRS_32.123 //
S04bsu034_u:4450: tebhiḥ saṃskāraṛddhīye kalāṃ nāyānti ṣoḍaśīm // SRS_32.124 //
S04bsu034_u:4452: anyatra lokanāthebhyo ye vā teṣāṃ same sthitāḥ // SRS_32.125 //
S04bsu034_u:4453: na teṣāmasti khālityaṃ na caiva palitaṃ śire /
S04bsu034_u:4454: audārikā jarā nāsti na duḥkhamaraṇaṃ tathā // SRS_32.126 //
S04bsu034_u:4455: saṃśayo vimatirnāsti kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate /
S04bsu034_u:4458: samacittāḥ sadā bhonti sarvasattvāna te 'ntike // SRS_32.128 //
S04bsu034_u:4468: sulabdhaṃ tena mānuṣyaṃ prahīṇāḥ sarvi akṣaṇāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4469: kṛtajñāḥ sarvabuddhānāṃ yeṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.133 //
S04bsu034_u:4471: yairitaḥ sūtraśreṣṭhāto dhṛtā gāthā catuṣpadā // SRS_32.134 //
S04bsu034_u:4473: kṣipraṃ ca bodhiṃ prāpsyanti teṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.135 //
S04bsu034_u:4474: na teṣāṃ kāṅkṣa vimatī sarvadharmeṣu bheṣyatī /
S04bsu034_u:4475: āsannā nirvṛtisteṣāṃ yeṣāṃ sūtramidaṃ priyam // SRS_32.136 //
S04bsu034_u:4477: sarve vyākṛtu buddhena drakṣyanti maitrakaṃ jinam // SRS_32.137 //
S04bsu034_u:4478: dṛṣṭvā maitreya saṃbuddhaṃ lapsyante kṣānti bhadrikām /
S04bsu034_u:4479: ye keci kṣayakālasminniha sūtre pratiṣṭhitāḥ // SRS_32.138 //
S04bsu034_u:4481: acintiyāyāṃ koṭīye kāṅkṣā teṣāṃ na vidyate // SRS_32.139 //
S04bsu034_u:4482: na teṣāṃ vidyate kāṅkṣā aṇūmātrāpi sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4483: aṇūmātre prahīṇesmin bodhisteṣāṃ na durlabhā // SRS_32.140 //
S04bsu034_u:4486: idaṃ sūtraṃ priyaṃ kṛtvā buddhānāṃ gañjarakṣakāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4491: teṣāṃ kāyagatā ete kṣayakāle pravartiṣu // SRS_32.144 //
S04bsu034_u:4492: te te nādaṃ nadiṣyanti buddhānāṃ kṣetrakoṭiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:4493: saṃmukhaṃ lokanāthānāṃ śākyasiṃhasya yā carī // SRS_32.145 //
S04bsu034_u:4498: ye rakṣiṣyantimāṃ bodhiṃ kṣayakāle mahābhaye // SRS_32.147 //
S04bsu034_u:4499: te te rūpeṇa saṃpannā lakṣaṇehi vicitritāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4506: niścarī romakūpebhyo yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // SRS_32.151 //
S04bsu034_u:4507: ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ sattvakoṭyo acintiyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4510: acintiyeṣu kṣetreṣu teṣāṃ śabdaḥ śruṇīyati // SRS_32.153 //
S04bsu034_u:4511: ye ca śṛṇvanti taṃ śabdaṃ teṣāṃ saṃjñā nirudhyate /
S04bsu034_u:4515: guṇānuśaṃsā ityete yā labhante ha paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4516: anye aparimāṇāśca yairiyaṃ bodhi dhāritā // SRS_32.156 //
S04bsu034_u:4518: vivartayitvā strībhāvaṃ sa bhaved dharmabhāṇakaḥ // SRS_32.157 //
S04bsu034_u:4519: na sā puno 'pi strībhāvamitaḥ paścād grahīṣyati /
S04bsu034_u:4520: bhavet prāsādiko nityaṃ lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaḥ // SRS_32.158 //
S04bsu034_u:4521: śreṣṭhe 'tha iha sūtrasmin guṇāḥ śreṣṭhāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4522: te 'sya sarve bhaviṣyanti kṣipraṃ bodhiṃ ca prāpsyate // SRS_32.159 //
S04bsu034_u:4523: viśāradaśca so nityaṃ bhoti sarvāsu jātiṣu /
S04bsu034_u:4524: dhārayitvā idaṃ sūtraṃ bodhisattvāna gocaram // SRS_32.160 //
S04bsu034_u:4526: ya icched buddhituṃ bodhimidaṃ sūtraṃ pravartayet // SRS_32.161 //
S04bsu034_u:4529: lapsyanti nacireṇemāṃ bhūmiṃ śāntāṃ samāhitāḥ // SRS_32.162 //
S04bsu034_u:4530: iha bodhīya te śūrā bodhisattvāḥ sthitāḥ sadā /
S04bsu034_u:4531: paśyanti buddhakoṭīyo yathā gaṅgāya vālikāḥ // SRS_32.163 //
S04bsu034_u:4535: sa labhitva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.164 //
S04bsu034_u:4544: śūnyānimittaṃ paramapraṇītu śāntaṃ dharma praśāntaṃ cara nipuṇaṃ asaṅgam /
S04bsu034_u:4545: svabhāvaśūnyaṃ sada virajaṃ praśāntaṃ samādhiprāptyā bahu jani saṃprakāśayī // SRS_32.167 //
S04bsu034_u:4547: gambhīra śāntaṃ labhiya imaṃ samādhimālokaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvalokaḥ // SRS_32.168 //
S04bsu034_u:4548: śuciśca nityaṃ bhaviṣyati brahmacārī sa nirāmagandhaḥ satatamasaṃkiliṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4549: anyāṃśca tatra sthapiṣyati sattvakoṭayo labdhvā praśāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.169 //
S04bsu034_u:4550: sa sutīkṣṇaprajño bhaviṣyati śreṣṭhaprajñaḥ śrutisāgaro 'sau nityamanantabuddhiḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4551: kalyāṇavākyo matikuśalo vidhijño dhāritva śāntiṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.170 //
S04bsu034_u:4553: ye karmasthānā tathariva śilpasthānā bhaiṣajyasthānāstathariva auṣadhīnām /
S04bsu034_u:4554: sarvatra dhīro bhaviṣyati pāraprāpto dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.171 //
S04bsu034_u:4555: kāvyeṣu śāstreṣu tathapi ca hāsyalāsye nṛtye 'tha gīte sukuśala pāraprāptaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4556: ācāryu loke bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.172 //
S04bsu034_u:4557: parivāravān so bhaviṣyati nityakālaṃ sa abhedyapakṣaḥ sada sahitaḥ samagraḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4558: caramāṇu śreṣṭhāṃ varāṃ śiva bodhicaryāṃ dhāritva sūtraṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.173 //
S04bsu034_u:4559: śokātha śalyā tathariva cittapīḍā no tasya jātu bhaviṣyati paṇḍitasya /
S04bsu034_u:4560: ārogyaprāpto bhaviṣyati sarvakālaṃ dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.174 //
S04bsu034_u:4561: ye kāyaśūlāstathariva cittaśūlāḥ ye dantaśūlāstathapi ca śīrṣaśūlāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4562: no tasya bhontī vyādhayu jīvaloke dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.175 //
S04bsu034_u:4563: yāvanta rogā bahuvidha martaloke ye kāyarogāstathariva cittarogāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4564: te tasya rogāḥ satata na jātu bhonti dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.176 //
S04bsu034_u:4565: cittasya vā ye bahuvidhu yatkileśāḥ kāye vāpi bahuvidha rogajātāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4566: te tasya nāstī bahuvidha saṃkileśā dhāritva śāntaṃ imu viraja samādhim // SRS_32.177 //
S04bsu034_u:4567: yathantarīkṣaṃ gaganamanopaliptaṃ prakṛtiviśuddhaṃ vimala prabhāsvaraṃ ca /
S04bsu034_u:4569: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati viśuddha tasyo dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.178 //
S04bsu034_u:4570: candrasya ābhā tathariva sūryaābhā śuddhā agrāhyā bhavati prabhāsvarāśca /
S04bsu034_u:4571: cittaṃ tathaiva bhavati prabhāsvaraṃ ca dhāritva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.179 //
S04bsu034_u:4572: yatha antarīkṣaṃ na sukaru citraṇāya raṅgān gṛhītvā bahuvidha naikarūpān /
S04bsu034_u:4573: cittaṃ tathaiva na sukaru citrituṃ sevetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.180 //
S04bsu034_u:4574: vāto yathaiva caturdiśa vāyamāno asajjamāno vrajati diśaḥ samantāt /
S04bsu034_u:4575: vātasamānā bhavati sa cittadhārā jagi so asakto vrajati anopaliptaḥ // SRS_32.181 //
S04bsu034_u:4576: jālena śakyaṃ gṛhṇitu vāyamānaḥ pāśena cāpī bandhitu śakya vātaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4577: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntamimu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.182 //
S04bsu034_u:4578: pratibhāsu śakyaṃ jalagata gṛhṇanāya saṃprāptu toyaṃ tathapi ca tailapātre /
S04bsu034_u:4579: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru vijānanāya bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.183 //
S04bsu034_u:4580: garjanti meghā vidyulatā carantā śakyaṃ grahītu pāṇina mānuṣeṇa /
S04bsu034_u:4581: no tasya cittaṃ sukaru pramāṇu jñātuṃ bhāvetva śāntaṃ imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.184 //
S04bsu034_u:4582: sattvāna śakyaṃ rūtaravitaṃ grahītuṃ ye santi sattvā daśadiśi buddhakṣetra /
S04bsu034_u:4583: cittasya tasyo na sukaru jñātu koṭiṃ samādhilabdho yada bhavi bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.185 //
S04bsu034_u:4585: so tāṃ labhitva virajaṃ samādhibhūmiṃ asaṃṃkiliṣṭo bhavati anopaliptaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4586: no tasya bhūyo tribhavi niveśa jātu anena labdho bhavati samādhi śāntaḥ // SRS_32.196 //
S04bsu034_u:4587: no kāmalolo na ca puna rūpalolo na istrilolo na ca puna bhrāntacittaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4588: śāntaḥ praśānto bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ // SRS_32.187 //
S04bsu034_u:4589: na putralolo na ca puna dhītalolo no bhāryalolo na ca parivāralolaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4590: suśāntacārī bhavati anopalipto yada bhoti labdho ayu virajaḥ samādhiḥ // SRS_32.188 //
S04bsu034_u:4591: na hiraṇyalolo na ca punararthalolo na svargalolo dhanarataneṣvasaktaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4592: suviśuddhacitto bhavati sa nirvikalpaḥ samādhiprāpto ayu bhavatī viśeṣaḥ // SRS_32.189 //
S04bsu034_u:4593: na svargahetoścarati sa brahmacaryaṃ na svargalolo dadati sadā nu vijñaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4596: no rājyahetoścarati tapo vrataṃ vā naiśvaryamarthāstribhuvani prārthamānaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4597: saṃbodhilolo bahujanahitāya niṣpādayī so imu virajaṃ samādhim // SRS_32.191 //
S04bsu034_u:4598: no tasya rāgo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ yo na strīlolo so bhavati bhrāntacittaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4599: tathāpi tena prakṛtiprajñāya rāgo labhitva etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam // SRS_32.192 //
S04bsu034_u:4600: no tasya doṣo janayati jātu pīḍāṃ vyāpādu yeno pratighamatho kareyya /
S04bsu034_u:4602: maitrāya teno nihata sa doṣadhātu pratilabhya etaṃ viraju samādhi śāntam // SRS_32.193 //
S04bsu034_u:4603: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ prajñāya teno nihata sa moha avidyā /
S04bsu034_u:4604: taṃ jñānu labdhaṃ vitimiramaprameyaṃ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ // SRS_32.194 //
S04bsu034_u:4605: aśubhāya rāgaḥ satata sunigṛhīto maitryāya doṣo nihatu sadā aśeṣaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4606: prajñāya moho vidhamiya kleśajālaṃ samādhiprāptaḥ pratapati sarvaloke // SRS_32.195 //
S04bsu034_u:4607: no tasya middhaṃ janayati jātu pīḍāṃ subhāvitā se vividha utkileśāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4608: anopalipto bhavati ca vipramuktaḥ samādhiprāpte imi guṇa aprameyāḥ // SRS_32.196 //
S04bsu034_u:4609: no tasya moho janayati jātu pīḍāṃ tathā hi tyāge abhiratu nityakālam /
S04bsu034_u:4610: sarvasvatyāgī bhavati sukhasya dātā ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.197 //
S04bsu034_u:4611: sthāmenupeto bhavati anopameyo sa balenupeto bhavati nityakālam /
S04bsu034_u:4612: no tasya loke bhavati samaḥ kadācid ya imaṃ samādhiṃ dhārayati bodhisattvaḥ // SRS_32.198 //
S04bsu034_u:4613: yadāpi rājā sa bhavati cakravartīṃ manujānu loke upagata jambudvīpe /
S04bsu034_u:4614: tadāpi bhotī bahujanapūjanīyo viśeṣaprāpto matima viśiṣṭaprajñaḥ // SRS_32.199 //
S04bsu034_u:4615: ye bhonti mukhyāḥ kularatanā viśiṣṭāḥ suprabhūtabhogā bahujanasvāpateyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4616: yatrāśva hastī rathavara yugyayānā hiraṇyasvarṇaṃ maṇīratanaṃ prabhūtam // SRS_32.200 //
S04bsu034_u:4618: ye śrāddha bhontī iha varabuddhajñāne te jambudvīpe kularatanābhiyuktāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4619: tatropapannaḥ kularatane viśiṣṭe karoti so 'rthaṃ suvipula jñātisaṃghe // SRS_32.201 //
S04bsu034_u:4620: aśrāddha ye vā iha kula jambudvipe śraddhāṃ sa teṣāṃ janayati apramattaḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4621: yaṃ bodhicitte pratiṣṭhiti sattvakāye te buddha bhontī jinapravaraḥ svayaṃbhūḥ // SRS_32.202 //
S04bsu034_u:4622: te ca spṛśitva atuliyamagrabodhiṃ cakraṃ pravartentyasadṛśa buddhakṣetre /
S04bsu034_u:4623: ye co vijānī imu tada dharmacakraṃ anutpattidharme nikhila te saṃpratiṣṭhī // SRS_32.203 //
S04bsu034_u:4624: subahukarāśco ami tada bodhisattvāḥ sattvāna bhonti satatu te pūjanīyāḥ /
S04bsu034_u:4625: karonti te 'rthaṃ atuliya nityakālaṃ sattvāna cakṣurvitimiru te janenti // SRS_32.204 //
S04bsu034_u:4626: bahava śatasahasrāḥ sattvakoṭī anantā yeṣa kuśalamūlā bhonti tatra śruṇitvā /
